TEXT.English: Philibert Tsiranana (18 October 1912 - 16 April 1978) was a Malagasy politician and leader, who served as the first President of Madagascar from 1959 to 1972. During the twelve years of his administration, the Republic of Madagascar enjoyed institutional stability that stood in contrast to the political turmoil many countries of the African mainland experienced in this period. This stability contributed to Tsiranana's popularity and his reputation as a remarkable statesman. Compared with the leaders of other developing countries of the time, his conduct appears honorable. Madagascar experienced moderate economic growth under his pragmatic socialist policies and came to be known as "the Happy Island." However, the democratization process was fraught with challenges and his term ultimately terminated in a political impasse that brought about the end of the democratic First Republic and ushered in the isolationist, Soviet-inspired socialist Second Republic.

Philip the Bold (French: Philippe le Hardi, Dutch: Filips de Stoute; 17 January 1342 - 27 April 1404, Halle) was Duke of Burgundy (as Philip II) and jure uxoris Count of Flanders (as Philip II), Artois and Burgundy (as Philip IV). The fourth and youngest son of King John II of France and his wife, Bonne of Luxembourg, Philip was the founder of the Burgundian branch of the House of Valois. His vast collection of territories made him the undisputed premier peer, and made his successors formidable rivals of the King of France.

TEXT.Spanish: Phonecian Bireme

TEXT.English: A bireme is an ancient oared warship (galley) with two decks of oars, probably invented by the Phoenicians. Long vessels built for military purposes had relatively high speed, meticulous construction, strength, and depending on the number of rows of oars, were called uniremes, biremes, triremes, quadriremes, etc.
TEXT.Polish: Diera, birema (³ac. biremis) - galera fenicka, starogrecka, rzymska, pocz¹tkowo wios³owa, a nastêpnie ¿aglowo-wios³owa, z dwoma rzêdami wiose³, budowana od ok. VII w. p.n.e. jako rozwiniêcie konstrukcji monery.

TEXT.English: Traditional Noongar people made a living by hunting and trapping a variety of game, including kangaroos, possums and wallabies; by fishing using spears and fish traps; as well as by gathering an extensive range of edible wild plants, including wattle seeds. Nuts of the zamia palm were something of a staple food, though it required extensive treatment to remove its toxicity, and for women may have had a contraceptive effect. Noongar people utilised quartz, replacing chert flint for spear and knife edges from 12,000 years ago, when the chert deposit was submerged by sea level rise during the Flandrian transgression.

The Pictish Warrior is a unique unit of the Pict culture, equivalent to the Light Swordsman. This warpainted ('picti' is Latin for 'painted [ones]') savage 'barbarian' was a formidable opponent, doubly so in the rugged terrain of his familiar homeland. He was the reason that the Romans never conquered modern-day Scotland, and instead built Hadrian's and the Antonine Wall.
TEXT.French: Le guerrier pictisque est une unité unique de la culture pictique, équivalente à l'épéiste léger. Ce « barbare » sauvage peint de guerre (picti signifie « peints » en latin) était un adversaire redoutable, d'autant plus dans le terrain accidenté de sa terre natale. Il est la raison pour laquelle les Romains n'ont jamais conquis l'Écosse moderne, construisant plutôt le mur d'Hadrien et le mur d'Antonin.

TEXT.English: Pier Gerlofs Donia (c.1480 1520) was a Frisian warrior, pirate, and rebel. He is best known by his West Frisian nickname "Grutte Pier" ("Greate Pier" in the Old Frisian spelling), or by the Dutch translations "Grote Pier" and "Lange Pier", or, in Latin, "Pierius Magnus", which referred to his legendary size and strength. Pier's armed band, known as the Arumer Zwarte Hoop (English: Arumer Black Heap, as in "group/mass of"), were pirates mainly active against the Hollanders and Burgundians at sea. He managed to capture many English and Holland ships, mainly on the Zuider Zee (today's IJsselmeer). In the biggest battle of his career, in 1515, he captured 28 Dutch ships, which earned him the nickname "Cross of the Dutchmen". Pier was basically a guerilla leader, who sought revenge against the Habsburg Empire whose soldiers allegedly raped and killed his wife in 1515. Despite his successes, Pier could not turn the Burgundian/Habsburg tide and he retired, disillusioned, in 1519. His nephew, Wierd Jelckama took over the command of Piers forces. Pier died peacefully in his bed on 18 October 1520.
TEXT.Polish: Pier Gerlofs Donia (c.1480 1520) was a Frisian warrior, pirate, and rebel. He is best known by his West Frisian nickname "Grutte Pier" ("Greate Pier" in the Old Frisian spelling), or by the Dutch translations "Grote Pier" and "Lange Pier", or, in Latin, "Pierius Magnus", which referred to his legendary size and strength. Pier's armed band, known as the Arumer Zwarte Hoop (English: Arumer Black Heap, as in "group/mass of"), were pirates mainly active against the Hollanders and Burgundians at sea. He managed to capture many English and Holland ships, mainly on the Zuider Zee (today's IJsselmeer). In the biggest battle of his career, in 1515, he captured 28 Dutch ships, which earned him the nickname "Cross of the Dutchmen". Pier was basically a guerilla leader, who sought revenge against the Habsburg Empire whose soldiers allegedly raped and killed his wife in 1515. Despite his successes, Pier could not turn the Burgundian/Habsburg tide and he retired, disillusioned, in 1519. His nephew, Wierd Jelckama took over the command of Piers forces. Pier died peacefully in his bed on 18 October 1520.

TEXT.English: The growing deployment of knights on the battlefield demanded that foot soldiers develop new means of fighting that would lessen their vulnerability to mounted opponents. One of the best ways to do this was to lengthen the reach of the infantrymen by arming them with long, sturdy spears known as pikes. Massed infantry armed with pikes -- particularly in conjunction with archers -- managed to even the battlefield odds. Armies equipped in this manner were able to hold their own until the invention of gunpowder made archers, pikemen, and knights a thing of the past.
TEXT.French: L'apparition des chevaliers sur les champs de bataille imposa la mise en place de nouvelles méthodes de combat pour rendre les soldats à pied moins vulnérables face à ces adversaires. L'une des solutions consistait à allonger la portée des fantassins en les équipant de longues et solides lances appelées piques. Une infanterie en formation serrée et équipée de piques rééquilibrait les forces en présence, surtout lorsqu'elle était utilisée conjointement avec les archers. Les armées ainsi pourvues pouvaient résister à l'ennemi, du moins jusqu'à ce que l'invention de la poudre rende les archers, les piquiers et les chevaliers obsolètes.
TEXT.German: Der vermehrte Einsatz von Rittern auf dem Schlachtfeld machte es erforderlich, neue Kampftechniken für Infanteristen zu entwickeln, um deren Verwundbarkeit gegenüber berittenen Gegnern zu reduzieren. Eine der effizientesten Methoden bestand darin, die Reichweite der Fußsoldaten zu erhöhen, indem sie mit langen, robusten Stangenwaffen, den so genannten Piken, ausgestattet wurden. Gewaltige derartig bewaffnete Infanterietruppen - vor allem in der Zusammenarbeit mit Bogenschützen - glichen den Nachteil auf dem Schlachtfeld wieder aus. Bis zur Erfindung des Schießpulvers, das schließlich die Bogenschützen, Pikeniere und Ritter ganz vom Schlachtfeld verdrängte, wurden Pikeniertruppen in vielen kriegerischen Konflikten erfolgreich eingesetzt.
TEXT.Italian: Il crescente sviluppo dei cavalieri sul campo di battaglia imponeva anche lo sviluppo di nuovi metodi di combattimento da parte dei fanti, metodi che avrebbero mitigato la loro vulnerabilità nei confronti dei soldati a cavallo. Uno dei modi migliori per raggiungere il risultato era quello di allungare la portata del fante, armandolo con lunghe e robuste lance, note con il nome di picche. Gruppi di fanti ammassati e armati di picche, in particolare in congiunzione con gli arcieri, riuscivano a eliminare lo svantaggio nei confronti dei cavalieri. Gli eserciti armati in questo modo furono in grado di cavarsela fino a quando l'invenzione della polvere da sparo rese arcieri, picchieri e cavalieri un reperto del passato.
TEXT.Spanish: El creciente despliegue de los caballeros en el campo de batalla exigía que los soldados de a pie desarrollasen nuevos métodos de lucha que redujesen su vulnerabilidad ante los rivales a caballo. Una de las mejores maneras de hacerlo fue ampliar el alcance de la infantería armándola con lanzas largas y robustas, llamadas picas. La infantería, armada con picas, consiguió equilibrar la balanza en el campo de batalla, sobre todo en combinación con los arqueros. Los ejércitos equipados de esta manera pudieron defenderse hasta que la invención de la pólvora convirtió a los arqueros, piqueros y caballeros en algo del pasado.

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]Подсказка: [COLOR_REVERT]+2 к населению для вновь основанного города.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]L'unità fornisce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]+2 di popolazione[COLOR_REVERT] quando fonda una città

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can Capture Merchant Ships [ICON_BULLET]Can Loot Gold From Merchant Ships
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut capturer des navires marchands [ICON_BULLET]Peut piller de l'or sur des navires marchands
TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]Подсказка: [COLOR_REVERT]Может захватывать торговые суда [ICON_BULLET]Может грабить золото с торговых судов
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]L'unità può [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]catturare[COLOR_REVERT] le navi mercantili [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]L'unità può [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]saccheggiare[COLOR_REVERT] le navi mercantili

TEXT.English: Piye (once transliterated as Piankhi; d. 721 BC) was a ancient Kushite king and founder of the Twenty-fifth dynasty of Egypt who ruled Egypt from 747 BCE to c.?722 BCE. He ruled from the city of Napata, located deep in Nubia, modern-day Sudan.
TEXT.French: Piye (autrefois translittéré Piankhi ; décédé en 721 av. J.-C.) était un ancien roi kushite et fondateur de la vingt-cinquième dynastie d'Égypte, qui régna de 747 à environ 722 av. J.-C. Il dirigeait depuis la ville de Napata, située au coeur de la Nubie, dans l'actuel Soudan.

TEXT.Polish: Czo³g plazmowy w przeciwieñstwie do zwyk³ego czo³gu, ten strzela wi¹zkami plazmy zamiast wybuchowymi pociskami. Wieczni Rycerze u¿ywali go, by próbowaæ w³amaæ siê do muzeum, ¿eby ukraœæ Zbrojê Bitewn¹ Toltecha. Ostatecznie czo³g zosta³ zniszczony przez Gniewa.

TEXT.English: The Plasma Tank is one of the most powerful tracked vehicles. Receives very high bonuses against mounted and melee units.
TEXT.French: Le char plasma est l'un des véhicules à chenilles les plus puissants. Il reçoit d'importants bonus contre les unités montées et de mêlée.
TEXT.Polish: Czo³g Plazmowy nalezy do najsilniejszych pojazdów g¹siênicowych. Otrzymuje bardzo wysokie bonusy przeciwko jednostkom konnym oraz walcz¹cym wrêcz.

TEXT.English: The Plasma thrower is an infantry unit that roasts its enemies with plasma, or superheated chemicals that have lost one or more of their electrons.
TEXT.French: Le lance-flammes plasma ou Lance-Plasma est une unité d'infanterie qui rôtit ses ennemis avec du plasma, ou des produits chimiques surchauffés ayant perdu un ou plusieurs électrons.
TEXT.Italian: Il lanciaplasma è un'unità di fanteria equipaggiata con armi al plasma o prodotti chimici sovrariscaldati, che hanno perso uno o più dei loro elettroni.
TEXT.Polish: Miotacz plazmy (karabin plazmowy) - prototypowa broñ, skonstruowana dla UNATCO i MJ12. Wykorzystuje pociski z plastiku domieszkowanego substancjami magnetycznymi, podgrzewanego do uzyskania plazmy. Jest ona potem kierowana przy pomocy elektromagnesów do wyjœcia lufy.
TEXT.Russian: Плазмометчики - это пехотный отряд, поджигающий своих противников плазмой или перегретыми химическими веществами, потерявшими один или несколько своих электронов.

TEXT.English: The Palestine Liberation Organization (PLO) is an organization founded in 1964 with the purpose of the "liberation of Palestine" through armed struggle. It is recognized as the "sole legitimate representative of the Palestinian people" by over 100 states with which it holds diplomatic relations, and has enjoyed observer status at the United Nations since 1974. The PLO was considered by the United States and Israel to be a terrorist organization until the Madrid Conference in 1991. In 1993, the PLO recognized Israel's right to exist in peace, accepted UN Security Council resolutions 242 and 338, and rejected "violence and terrorism"; in response, Israel officially recognized the PLO as the representative of the Palestinian people.

The natives of Central America had developed the bow and used it in combat. Their bow technology was not far advanced, however, in comparison to the Asian composite bow or English longbow. Archers could be ordered to wound when capture of enemies was more important than killing. Like all other Mayan warriors, archers wore distinctive costumes so commanders could distinguish their troops and place the right group where needed. The status of archers was low in comparison to other warrior ranks, so men of lower standing and skill entered their ranks. Men of status and ambition joined the ranks of the Eagle Warrior where they could have the opportunity to take captives. The better skilled and experienced bowmen became Elite Plumed Archers. They were especially important when absolute victory was required because they had the ability to kill enemies quickly and break enemy army morale under a barrage of well-aimed arrows.
TEXT.Italian: L'arciere piumato è un'unità unica della cultura huasteca che sostituisce l'arciere standard; oltre alle normali abilità di un arciere, ottiene anche la promozione Mobilità.

TEXT.English: Pocahontas was the daughter of Powhatan, an important chief of the Algonquian Indians (the Powhatans) who lived in the Virginia region. Her real name was "Matoaka." "Pocahontas" was a nickname meaning "playful" or "mischievous one." Pocahontas is most famous for reportedly saving the life of English Captain John Smith. Throughout her short life (she died at the age of 22), however, she was important in other ways as well. Pocahontas tried to promote peace between the Powhatans and the English colonists. She even converted to Christianity and married John Rolfe, a Jamestown colonist, a union which helped bring the two groups together. Her untimely death in England hurt the chance for continued peace in Virginia between the Algonquians and the colonists. Still, for centuries after her death, she has been venerated by many Americans as a symbol of peace and harmony, as well as the Native American peoples in general.
TEXT.Polish: Pocahontas (ur. ok. 1595, zm. 21 marca 1617)? pó³nocnoamerykañska Indianka, której ¿ycie sta³o siê kanw¹ dla wielu romantycznych historii. Nosi³a imiê Matoaka (Bia³e Piórko), natomiast Pocahontas (Ma³a Psotnica lub £obuziak) by³o jej przydomkiem z okresu dzieciñstwa. By³a córk¹ Powhatana, wodza Federacji Powhatañskiej, kontroluj¹cego tereny obecnej Wirginii. Po ma³¿eñstwie z Johnem Rolfe'em przyjê³a imiê i nazwisko Rebecca Rolfe. Prawdopodobnie uratowa³a przed egzekucj¹ kolonistê Johna Smitha, pojmanego w grudniu 1607 roku i skazanego przez Powhatanów na œmieræ. Nie jest pewne, czy mia³a to byæ egzekucja czy rytualne przy³¹czenie kolonisty do plemienia, ani czy wydarzenie to? opisane wiele lat póŸniej przez samego Smitha rzeczywiœcie mia³o miejsce. Wiadomo jednak, ¿e wielokrotnie odwiedza³a kolonistów i dostarcza³a im ¿ywnoœæ, a w styczniu 1609 roku ostrzeg³a Anglików, ¿e jej ojciec zamierza ich zabiæ, gdy przyjd¹ do wioski na rozmowy w sprawie dostaw zbo¿a. Od tamtej pory zamieszka³a u bardziej sprzyjaj¹cych Anglikom Potomaków. W kwietniu 1613 roku Pocahontas zosta³a ujêta przez kapitana Samuela Argalla z Jamestown. Anglicy chcieli wymieniæ j¹ na w³asnych ludzi przetrzymywanych przez Powhatana. Do wymiany nie dosz³o, jednak od tego momentu ¿ycie Pocahontas uleg³o radykalnej zmianie? nauczy³a siê angielskiego i zosta³a ochrzczona przez Aleksandra Whitakera, przyjmuj¹c imiê Rebecca. Chocia¿ by³a ju¿ zarêczona z jednym z cz³onków plemienia, Kokumem, za zgod¹ ojca i gubernatora Thomasa Dale'a wziê³a 5 kwietnia 1614 roku œlub z m³odym wdowcem, plantatorem tytoniu, Johnem Rolfe'em, przyjmuj¹c jednoczeœnie nazwisko mê¿a. Ma³¿eñstwo nie sta³o siê przyczyn¹ wymiany jeñców, jednak zapewni³o doœæ trwa³y pokój miêdzy kolonistami a plemieniem a¿ do œmierci Powhatana w 1618 roku. Pocahontas i John Rolfe mieli syna, urodzonego w 1615 roku, któremu nadano imiê Thomas. W roku 1616 wyjecha³a z mê¿em i kilkoma Indianami do Anglii, m.in. po to, by zabiegaæ o fundusze na budowê chrzeœcijañskiej szko³y dla indiañskich i angielskich dzieci. Zosta³a tam obwo³ana indiañsk¹ ksiê¿niczk¹, co mia³o przekonaæ Europejczyków ¿e Indie Zachodnie s¹ bezpiecznym i przyjaznym miejscem, które bez obaw mo¿na kolonizowaæ. Pokahontas spotka³a siê nawet z królem Jakubem I. W 1617 roku, w trakcie przygotowañ do powrotu zmar³a jednak na czarn¹ ospê. Pochowano j¹ w Anglii przy koœciele œw. Jerzego w Gravesend.

TEXT.English: Codenamed The Plague Bringer, this missile is beyond the BBM, perfect for weakening a few enemies within one nuke. Using the latest in Genetic manipulation, these new viruses not only make people sick, killing them at an extremely accelerated rate, but can spread like a wild fire. The new and improved smog also contains concentrated sulphuric acid vapours to easily take down anything from a tank to a battleship. If the viral entities enter water, it will become polluted, killing all sea life and plugging up all natural vents such as oil deposits. WARNING: Viral clouds are subject to wind will spread to other plots and could cause the entire planet to be consumed by this virus if not taken care of immediately.
TEXT.German: Diese Rakete, die den Codenamen Pestbringer trägt, ist noch verheerender als die BBM. Sie ist perfekt dafür geeignet, den Gegner mit einem einzigen Schlag schwer zu schwächen. Die neuen Viren an Bord dieser Rakete nutzen die neuesten Erkenntnisse in der Genmanipulation. Sie lassen die Menschen nicht nur erkranken und extrem schnell sterben, sie verbreiten sich auch noch wie ein Lauffeuer. Der neue, verbesserte Nebel enthält konzentrierte Schwefelsäuredämpfe, die alles vom Panzer bis zum Schlachtschiff zerlegen. Wenn die Viren ins Wasser geraten, wird es verseucht, wodurch alle Tiere sterben und alle natürlichen Rohstoffvorkommen, wie Ölquellen, vernichtet werden. ACHTUNG: Die Virenwolken können vom Wind abgetrieben werden und damit auch Gebiete befallen, die eigentlich nicht zerstört werden sollten. Mit dieser Waffe kann leicht der ganze Planet entvölkert werden, wenn den Viren nicht schnell Einhalt geboten wird.
TEXT.Italian: Con il nome in codice Plague Bringer, questo missile è oltre la MMB, perfetto per indebolire alcuni nemici con una sola bomba. Usano i più recenti ritrovati nella manipolazione genetica, questi virus non solo fanno ammalare le persone (uccidendole a un ritmo molto veloce), ma possono diffondersi come un fuoco incontrollato. Il nuovo smog contiene vapori di acido solforico concentrato per distruggere facilmente tutto, da un carro armato a una corazzata. Se i virus entrano in acqua essa viene contaminata, uccidendo la vita marina e distruggendo le correnti marine e i depositi petroliferi. ATTENZIONE: Le nuvole virali sono soggette ai venti e possono espandersi ad altre caselle, facendo consumare tutto il pianeta da questo virus se non vengono presi provvedimenti immediati.
TEXT.Russian: Эта ракета, получившая кодовое название «Вестник чумы», по своим возможностям выходит далеко за рамки обычных биоракет и идеально подходит для ослабления нескольких врагов путем подрыва одной-единственной «грязной бомбы». Используя генетические манипуляции, искусственные вирусы, содержащиеся в ней, это оружие поражает людей невиданными прежде заболеваниями, убивая их с чрезвычайно высокой скоростью, но и могут распространяться со скоростью лесного пожара. Новый улучшенный смог также содержит концентрированные пары серной кислоты, которые быстро выводит из строя все что угодно - от танка до линкора. Если вирусные частицы попадают в воду, она загрязняется, уничтожая всю морскую жизнь и закупоривая все естественные каналы, такие как нефтяные отложения. [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]ПРЕДУПРЕЖДЕНИЕ:[COLOR_REVERT] инфекционные облака подвержены воздействию ветра и могут распространиться на соседние участки и это может привести к тому, что впоследствии будет уничтожено все живое на целых континентах, если не заблаговременно не позаботиться о дезинфекции.

TEXT.English: The BBM, or Biological Ballistic Missile, is the next step up from the Biological Missile. This missile can be considered a nuke by it's devastating effects that it unleashes upon impact. Using genetic manipulation, the artificial viruses contained within make beings sick beyond anything they have ever experienced before all while the synthetic smog protects the viruses from the sun and also contains Hydrochloric Acid vapours to eat away at metal simultaneously. If the viral entities enter water, it will become polluted, killing all sea life and plugging up all natural vents such as oil deposits. WARNING: Viral clouds are subject to wind and may spread to other plots and may cause entire continents to be consumed if not taken care of.
TEXT.German: Die BBM (Biological Ballistic Missile) ist eine ballistische, mit Biowaffen bestückte Rakete und damit die Weiterentwicklung der Biorakete. Wenn man die verheerenden Schäden betrachtet, die diese Rakete beim Einschlag anrichtet, kann sie durchaus mit einer Atombombe gleichgesetzt werden. Die künstlichen Viren an Bord nutzen genetische Manipulationen, um die Menschen schlimmer als jemals zuvor erkranken zu lassen. Der synthetische Nebel schützt die Viren vor der Sonne und zerstört gleichermaßen das im Umfeld befindliche Metall. Wenn die Viren ins Wasser geraten, wird es verseucht, wodurch alle Tiere sterben und alle natürlichen Rohstoffvorkommen, wie Ölquellen, vernichtet werden. ACHTUNG: Die Virenwolken können vom Wind abgetrieben werden und damit auch Gebiete befallen, die eigentlich nicht zerstört werden sollten. Diese Seuche ist in der Lage, ganze Kontinente zu entvölkern, wenn ihr kein Einhalt geboten wird.
TEXT.Italian: La MMB, o Missile Biologico Balistico, è il miglioramento del missile biologico. Questo missile può essere considerato una bomba atomica per gli effetti devastanti che causa all'impatto. Usando la manipolazione genetica, i virus artificiali contenuti causano malattie peggiori di qualunque mai vista prima, tutto mentre lo smog sintetico protegge i virus dal sole e corrode il metallo. Se il virus entra in contatto con l'acqua la inquina, uccidendo la vita marina distruggendo le correnti marine e i depositi petroliferi. ATTENZIONE: Le nuvole virali sono soggette ai venti e possono espandersi su altre caselle.
TEXT.Polish: The BBM, or Biological Ballistic Missile, is the next step up from the Biological Missile. This missile can be considered a nuke by it's devastating effects that it unleashes upon impact. Using genetic manipulation, the artificial viruses contained within make beings sick beyond anything they have ever experienced before all while the synthetic smog protects the viruses from the sun and eats away at metal simultaneously. If the viral entities enter water, it will become polluted, killing all sea life and plugging up all natural vents such as oil deposites. WARNING: Viral clouds are subject to wind and may spread to other plots.
TEXT.Russian: ББР, или Биологическая Баллистическая Ракета, является следующим шагом от Биоракеты. Эту ракету можно считать ядерной бомбой, поскольку она имеет разрушительные последствия, возникающие впоследствии удара. Используя генетические манипуляции, искусственные вирусы, содержащиеся в ней, это оружие поражает людей невиданными прежде заболеваниями, в то время как синтетический смог защищает вирусы от губительного воздействия ультрафиолетовых лучей Солнца, а также содержит пары соляной кислоты для одновременного разъедания металла. Если вирусные частицы попадают в воду, она загрязняется, уничтожая всю морскую жизнь и закупоривая все естественные каналы, такие как нефтяные отложения. [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]ВНИМАНИЕ:[COLOR_REVERT] инфекционные облака подвержены воздействию ветра и могут распространиться на соседние участки и это может привести к тому, что впоследствии будет уничтожено все живое на целых континентах, если не заблаговременно не позаботиться о дезинфекции.

TEXT.English: The polar bear (Ursus maritimus) is a carnivorous bear whose native range lies largely within the Arctic Circle, encompassing the Arctic Ocean, its surrounding seas and surrounding land masses. It is a large bear, approximately the same size as the omnivorous Kodiak bear (Ursus arctos middendorffi). A boar (adult male) weighs around 350 - 700 kg (770 - 1,540 lb), while a sow (adult female) is about half that size. Although it is the sister species of the brown bear, it has evolved to occupy a narrower ecological niche, with many body characteristics adapted for cold temperatures, for moving across snow, ice, and open water, and for hunting the seals which make up most of its diet. Although most polar bears are born on land, they spend most of their time at sea. Their scientific name means "maritime bear", and derives from this fact. Polar bears hunt their preferred food of seals from the edge of sea ice, often living off fat reserves when no sea ice is present.
TEXT.Polish: NiedŸwiedŸ polarny, niedŸwiedŸ bia³y (Thalarctos maritimus) - gatunek du¿ego ssaka drapie¿nego z rodziny niedŸwiedziowatych, zamieszkuj¹cego Arktykê. Jest drapie¿nikiem szczytowym w zasiêgu swojego wystêpowania. Grube futro i warstwa t³uszczu chroni¹ go przed zimnem. W³osy tworz¹ce sierœæ niedŸwiedzia s¹ pó³przezroczyste; sierœæ jako ca³oœæ ma zazwyczaj kolor bia³y lub kremowy, przez co umo¿liwia zwierzêciu dobry kamufla¿. Skóra ma barwê czarn¹. NiedŸwiedŸ polarny ma krótki ogon i ma³e uszy, co pomaga mu redukowaæ utratê ciep³a. Stosunkowo ma³a g³owa i d³ugie, zwê¿aj¹ce siê ku ty³owi cia³o nadaj¹ mu op³ywowy kszta³t przydatny do p³ywania. Jest ssakiem prowadz¹cym niemal morski tryb ¿ycia, potrzebuj¹cym do przetrwania jedynie kawa³ka p³ywaj¹cego lodu i ¿ywnoœci znajdowanej w wodzie, oraz miejsca do urodzenia i odchowania m³odych. Jego systematyczna (³aciñska) nazwa Ursus maritimus oznacza "niedŸwiedŸ morski". Przystosowa³ siê do ¿ycia na l¹dzie, morzu i lodzie.

TEXT.English: Police APC is a multi-role light armoured personnel carrier that can used for police forces, armored troops, peacekeeping and anti-terrorism.
TEXT.French: Le VAB de police est un véhicule blindé léger polyvalent utilisé par les forces de police, les troupes blindées, pour le maintien de la paix et la lutte antiterroriste.
TEXT.Russian: Полицейская бронемашина - это многоцелевой легкий бронетранспортер, который может использоваться для полиции, бронетанковых войск, операций по поддержанию мира и борьбы с терроризмом.

TEXT.English: A police car is a ground vehicle used by police, to assist with their duties in patrolling and responding to incidents. Typical uses of a police car include transportation for officers to reach the scene of an incident quickly, to transport suspects, or to patrol an area, while providing a high visibility deterrent to crime. Some police cars are specially adapted for certain locations (e.g. work on busy roads) or for certain operations (e.g. to transport police dogs or bomb squads).
TEXT.French: Une voiture de police est un véhicule terrestre utilisé par la police pour aider dans leurs missions de patrouille et d'intervention. Les usages typiques incluent le transport rapide des agents sur les lieux d'un incident, le transport de suspects ou la patrouille dans une zone, tout en offrant un effet dissuasif visible contre la criminalité. Certaines voitures de police sont spécialement adaptées à certains lieux (ex. routes très fréquentées) ou opérations particulières (ex. transport de chiens policiers ou unités anti-bombes).
TEXT.Russian: Полицейская машина - это наземное транспортное средство, используемое полицией для оказания помощи при патрулировании и реагировании на инциденты. Типичное использование полицейской машины включает транспортировку для оперативников, чтобы быстро добраться до места происшествия, для перевозки подозреваемых или для патрулирования территории, обеспечивая при этом средство сдерживания преступности с высокой видимостью. Некоторые полицейские машины специально приспособлены для определенных мест (например, для работы на загруженных дорогах) или для определенных операций (например, для перевозки полицейских собак или отрядов саперов).

TEXT.English: Police Dog, commonly referred to as a "K-9 dog" (which is a homophone of canine), is a dog that is trained specifically to assist police and other law-enforcement personnel in their work.
TEXT.French: Le chien policier est un chien dressé spécifiquement pour assister la police et les autres forces de l'ordre dans leur travail.
TEXT.Polish: Pies policyjny jest specjalnie tresowany towarzyszenia policjantom w pracy.
TEXT.Russian: Полицейская собака, обычно называемая «собакой К-9» (которая является омофоном собаки), - это собака, специально обученная для оказания помощи полиции и другим сотрудникам правоохранительных органов в их работе.

TEXT.English: Vertical flight has proven to be an invaluable tool for Law Enforcement, particularly in the larger cities. Police helicopters are not military attack vehicles but are equipped with surveilance equipment and the capacity to track down offenders on the run and keep them in sight until ground forces can make an arrest.
TEXT.French: Le vol vertical s'est avéré un outil précieux pour les forces de l'ordre, particulièrement dans les grandes villes. Les hélicoptères de police ne sont pas des véhicules d'attaque militaire mais sont équipés de systèmes de surveillance et capables de poursuivre les délinquants en fuite, les maintenant en vue jusqu'à l'arrivée des forces au sol pour procéder à l'arrestation.

TEXT.English: Police mechs are designed for urban environments, emphasising pacification and crimefighting rather than maximum firepower and armour. A fine example of this type of unit is the superb AV-98 Ingram manufactured by Shinohara Heavy Industries.
TEXT.French: Les mechs policiers sont conçus pour les environnements urbains, mettant l'accent sur la pacification et la lutte contre la criminalité plutôt que sur la puissance de feu maximale et l'armure. Un excellent exemple de ce type d'unité est le superbe AV-98 Ingram fabriqué par Shinohara Heavy Industries.
TEXT.Italian: Unità per il controllo dei riottosi.
TEXT.Russian: Боевая броня или их более легкая разновидность силовой брони является основной экипировкой для тяжелой пехоты будущего. Повышенная сопротивляемость боевой брони, внутренний климат-контроль и огневая мощь делают ее более эффективной, чем стандартную пехоту в различных ролях, но и намного дороже. Боевая броня впервые эволюционировала из экзоскелетов во время Звездной Лиги в начале двадцать восьмого века, но не получила широкого распространения на полях сражений, пока клан Волка не дебютировал с элементалем в середине двадцать девятого века. Армии Внутренней Сферы начали использовать боевую броню в середине тридцать первого века. Эти боевые костюмы были созданы на основе боевой брони клана, захваченной или спасенной во время операции «Возрождение».

TEXT.English: Pomare I, was the unifier and first king of Tahiti and founder of the Pomare dynasty and the Kingdom of Tahiti between 1788 - and 1791.
TEXT.French: Pomare I fut l'unificateur et premier roi de Tahiti et fondateur de la dynastie Pomare et du Royaume de Tahiti entre 1788 et 1791.
TEXT.Polish: Pomare I by³ pierwszy królem zjednoczonego Tahiti pod koniec XVIII wieku.

TEXT.English: Pomare IV (28 February 1813 - 17 September 1877), more properly Aimata Pomare IV Vahine-o-Punuateraitua (otherwise known as Aimata - "eye-eater", after an old custom of the ruler to eat the eye of the defeated foe), was the Queen of Tahiti between 1827 and 1877. She was the fourth monarch of the Kingdom of Tahiti.
TEXT.French: Pomare IV (28 février 1813 - 17 septembre 1877), plus correctement Aimata Pomare IV Vahine-o-Punuateraitua (sinon appelée Aimata - "mangeuse d'yeux", d'après une vieille coutume du souverain de manger l'oeil du foe vaincu), était la Reine de Tahiti entre 1827 et 1877.

TEXT.English: The Kongo region (modern day Angola, western Democratic Republic of the Congo, southern Republic of the Congo) exhibits a number of indigenous military systems, particularly by such kingdoms at Kongo and Ndongo. Recruitment, organization and special units. The bulk of the fighting hosts were made of up general purpose levies and volunteers, but most Kongo polities maintained a small core of dedicated soldiers- nucleus of a standing army. Special detachments and commands called lucanzos were also used for various missions, and one such under a commander called Kakula ka Kabasa was defeated by the Portuguese in 1586 when crossing a river. Other special troops sometimes used included elite scouting units, the pombos, who sometimes ran with, and kept up with horses when they were used in the region. The pombos also performed pursuit duties. "Light" and "heavy" troop types were recognized. The light troops were far more numerous, and relied more on individual skill and technique (dodging spears for example). The "heavies" were more disciplined and relied on stronger defensive weapons and formations.

These four-masted sailing ships were the first European ships able to reliably navigate the open ocean. Although small by modern standards, the Carrack afforded enough space for crew, cargo and small cannons. Because the ship rose high out of the water it was near impossible for smaller ships to board a carrack. This size was a double edged sword, and due to its height Carracks were prone to capsize in strong winds. The Carrack was used most prominently by the Portuguese and Spanish during their explorations in the 15th and 16th centuries. The Santa Maria, the ship that carried Columbus to the New World, was a Carrack.
TEXT.French: Ces navires à quatre mâts sont les premiers bateaux européens capables de naviguer sur l'océan. Bien que petite selon les critères modernes, la caraque offre assez d'espace pour abriter un équipage, une cargaison et quelques petits canons. Ce bateau s'élève bien au-dessus de la mer, il est donc presque impossible pour les plus petits navires de l'aborder. Cette taille ne présente pas que des avantages car les caraques sont enclines à chavirer en cas de grand vent. La caraque est surtout utilisée par les Portugais et les Espagnols au cours de leurs explorations des 15ème et 16ème siècles. La Santa Maria, le vaisseau qui transporta Christophe Colomb jusqu'au Nouveau monde, était une caraque.
TEXT.German: Diese Vier-Mast-Segelschiffe waren die ersten europäischen Schiffe, die in der Lage waren, zuverlässig auf dem offenen Meer zu fahren. Obwohl sie nach modernen Maßstäben klein war, bot die Karacke genug Platz für Mannschaft, Fracht und kleine Kanonen. Da das Schiff hoch aus dem Wasser ragte, war es für kleinere Schiffe beinahe unmöglich anzugreifen. Diese Höhe war ein zweischneidiges Schwert, da die Karacke daher auch bei starken Winden zum Kentern neigte. Die Karacke wurde vor allem von den Portugiesen und Spaniern bei ihren Entdeckungsreisen im 15. und 16. Jahrhundert genutzt. Die Santa Maria, das Schiff, das Kolumbus in die Neue Welt brachte, war eine Karacke.
TEXT.Italian: Queste navi a quattro alberi furono le prime imbarcazioni europee in grado di navigare in sicurezza nell'oceano aperto. Anche se piccole, secondo gli standard moderni, le Caracche avevano abbastanza spazio da ospitare equipaggio, carico e piccoli cannoni. A causa dell'altezza delle murate era quasi impossibile, per navi più piccole, abbordare una Caracca. Le dimensioni erano una spada a doppio taglio, però, proprio a causa dell'altezza, infatti, le Caracche tendevano a capovolgersi in caso di venti troppo forti. La Caracca venne usata principalmente da Portoghesi e Spagnoli durante le esplorazioni del 15° e 16° secolo. La Santa Maria, la nave che portò Colombo nel Nuovo Mondo, era una Caracca.
TEXT.Spanish: Estas naves de cuatro mástiles fueron los primeros barcos europeos capaces de aventurarse sin peligro en mar abierta. Aunque pequeñas según los estándares modernos, las carracas contaban con espacio suficiente para alojar a la tripulación, el cargamento y varios cañones de pequeño tamaño. Tenían la borda tan elevada que para las demás naves era casi imposible abordarlas. Sin embargo, esto resultaba ser un arma de doble filo, puesto que las hacía muy vulnerables a los vientos fuertes. Tanto los españoles como los portugueses las utilizaron con frecuencia durante sus exploraciones en los siglos XV y XVI. La Santa María, una de las naves que Colón llevó al Nuevo Mundo, era una carraca.

TEXT.English: Battle Armor is heavier armored infantry than Power Armor. Battle armor's improved resilience, mobility, atmospheric containment, and firepower make it more effective than standard infantry in a variety of roles, but much more expensive. It is typically deployed in platoons of around five suits, operating to support mechanised units in a similar way to conventional infantry.
TEXT.French: L'armure de combat est une infanterie blindée plus lourde que l'armure de puissance. Son amélioration en résilience, mobilité, confinement atmosphérique, et puissance de feu la rend plus efficace que l'infanterie standard dans divers rôles, mais bien plus coûteuse. Elle est généralement déployée en pelotons d'environ cinq combinaisons, opérant pour soutenir les unités mécanisées de manière similaire à l'infanterie conventionnelle.
TEXT.Russian: Боевая броня или их более легкая разновидность силовой брони является основной экипировкой для тяжелой пехоты будущего. Повышенная сопротивляемость боевой брони, внутренний климат-контроль и огневая мощь делают ее более эффективной, чем стандартную пехоту в различных ролях, но и намного дороже. Боевая броня впервые эволюционировала из экзоскелетов во время Звездной Лиги в начале двадцать восьмого века, но не получила широкого распространения на полях сражений, пока клан Волка не дебютировал с элементалем в середине двадцать девятого века. Армии Внутренней Сферы начали использовать боевую броню в середине тридцать первого века. Эти боевые костюмы были созданы на основе боевой брони клана, захваченной или спасенной во время операции «Возрождение».

TEXT.English: The Poyas were a subgroup of indigenous Tehuelche people living in the Andes of Llanquihue and Palena Province as well as on the southern shores of Nahuel Huapi Lake in present-day Argentina. The Jesuit priest Nicolas Mascardi divided the Poya language into two linguistically distinct groups the one spoken by the "comarcanos" of Nahuelhuapi and another one spoken further east as far away as to the Atlanctic Ocean.
TEXT.French: Les Poya formaient un sous-groupe des Téhuelsches indigènes vivant dans les Andes de Llanquihue et de la province de Palena, ainsi que sur les rives sud du lac Nahuel Huapi dans l'actuelle Argentine. Le prêtre jésuite Nicolas Mascardi divisa la langue Poya en deux groupes linguistiquement distincts : l'un parlé par les « comarcanos » de Nahuelhuapi, et l'autre parlé plus à l'est, jusqu'à l'océan Atlantique.

TEXT.English: [H1]Po Ngbe [\H1][NEWLINE][BOLD]King of the Olmec[\BOLD][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Between 900-600 BC one of the major rulers at Guerrero was Po Ngbe. There is also an important tablet from Ahuelican, Guerrero of mottled green stone that also mentions King Po Ngbe, and his building of a great temple at his site.[PARAGRAPH:1]The Guerrero celt makes it clear that Po Ngbe was recognized as a member of the craftsmen caste. He was ruler of the place where these artifacts were found. This celt also makes it clear that Po Ngbe was probably buried in a pyramid. This view is supported by the Ahuelican, Guerrero Tablet. This artifact was made of the same stone as the Teo mask and the Guerrero celt. Recently a mask of Po Ngbe was recently discovered and published. The mask of Po Ngbe has an inscription written on the inside of the mask.[PARAGRAPH:1]In the first column of the Teo Mask inscription we read the following:[PARAGRAPH:2]"Cause (here) the conferring of all virtue to this very good abode. Admiration indeed (Oh) Governor. Indeed (you are) wonder. Thou (art) a spirit of tranquility. (Thou art like) the Jaguar (a master of the bush). Righteousness takes root here in this tomb of Na Po Ngbe. This habitation of the devotee (is) a habitation of propriety. Order (Na Po Ngbe) this object of respect to be an envoy on a mission (to) hold upright purity. He who is a powerful spirit (in) thine tomb. Righteousness takes root here (in your) tomb. [Na Po Ngbe] A boundless source of great spiritual tranquility (your) abode. The tomb is powerful. lay low (the celebrity) [in the tomb] to realize spiritual tranquility."
TEXT.Polish: Po Ngbe by³ w³adc¹ Olmeków pomiêdzy 900 do 600 rokiem p.n.e.

TEXT.English: Precision Attack Munition is used to attack vehicles, armor, bunkers, and other targets of opportunity. Uses 3 modes of guidance, GPS/INS, semi-active laser homing, and autonomous imaging infrared. Carries a multi-mode warhead effective against several types of targets. It also includes an online library of pictures of targets, so that it can visually identify what it is homing in on.
TEXT.French: La munition de précision est utilisée pour attaquer véhicules, blindages, bunkers et autres cibles opportunistes. Elle utilise 3 modes de guidage : GPS/INS, poursuite laser semi-active et imagerie infrarouge autonome. Elle porte une ogive multimode efficace contre plusieurs types de cibles. Elle inclut également une bibliothèque en ligne d'images de cibles, lui permettant d'identifier visuellement sa cible.

TEXT.English: Prempeh I (Otumfuo Nana Prempeh I, 18 December 1870 - 12 May 1931) was the thirteenth King ruler of the Asante state of the Kingdom of Ashanti and the Asante Oyoko Abohyen Dynasty. King Asantehene Prempeh I ruled from March 26, 1888 until his death in 1931, and fought an Ashanti war against Britain in 1893.
TEXT.French: Prempeh I (Otumfuo Nana Prempeh I, 18 décembre 1870 - 12 mai 1931) fut le treizième roi de l'État Ashanti du Royaume Ashanti et de la dynastie Asante Oyoko Abohyen. Le roi Asantehene Prempeh I régna du 26 mars 1888 jusqu'à sa mort en 1931, et mena une guerre ashanti contre la Grande-Bretagne en 1893.
TEXT.Polish: Prempeh (ur. oko³o 1872, zm. 1931) - Asantehene (w³adca Asante) w latach 1888-1931. Jego rz¹dy by³y byæ mo¿e najbardziej dramatyczne i najbardziej tragiczne z jakichkolwiek w historii Asante. Jego matk¹ by³a Yaa Akyaa, Królowa matka albo Asantehemaa, a ojcem Kwasi Gyambibi.

TEXT.English: The dreadnought was the predominant type of 20th-century battleship. The first of the kind, the Royal Navy's Dreadnought had such an impact when launched in 1906 that battleships built after her were referred to as 'dreadnoughts', and earlier battleships became known as pre-dreadnoughts. Her design had two revolutionary features; an 'all-big-gun' armament scheme and steam turbine propulsion. The arrival of the dreadnoughts renewed the naval arms race, principally between Britain and Germany but reflected worldwide, as the new class of warships became a crucial symbol of national power.[PARAGRAPH:2]The concept of an all-big-gun ship had been in development for several years before Dreadnought's construction. The Imperial Japanese Navy had begun work on an all-big-gun battleship in 1904, but finished the ship as a pre-dreadnought; the United States Navy was also building all-big-gun battleships. Technical development continued rapidly through the dreadnought era. Successive designs increased rapidly in size and made use of improvements in armament, armor, and propulsion. Within ten years, new battleships outclassed Dreadnought herself. These more powerful vessels were known as 'super-dreadnoughts'. Most of the dreadnoughts were scrapped after the end of World War I under the terms of the Washington Naval Treaty, but many of the newer super-dreadnoughts continued serving through World War II.[PARAGRAPH:2]While dreadnought building consumed vast resources in the early 20th century, there was only one pitched battle between dreadnought fleets. At the Battle of Jutland, the British and German navies clashed with no decisive result. The term 'dreadnought' gradually dropped from use after World War I, as all battleships shared dreadnought characteristics; it can also be used to describe battlecruisers, the other type of ship resulting from the dreadnought revolution.
TEXT.Polish: HMS Dreadnought? pancernik brytyjski o prze³omowej konstrukcji, który wszed³ do s³u¿by w 1906 roku i zarazem szósty okrêt Royal Navy nosz¹cy tê nazwê. "Dreadnought" tak mocno zaznaczy³ siê w rozwoju okrêtów, ¿e od jego nazwy pochodzi okreœlenie rodzaju pancerników? drednotów. Wszystkie okrêty, które by³y oparte na wczeœniejszych projektach, sta³y siê po jego wejœciu do s³u¿by przestarza³e i s¹ obecnie okreœlane jako przeddrednoty. Jego wejœcie do s³u¿by by³o jedn¹ z g³ównych przes³anek, które da³y pocz¹tek nowemu wyœcigowi zbrojeñ morskich pomiêdzy ówczesnymi potêgami militarnymi (Wielk¹ Brytani¹ i Niemcami), co w konsekwencji by³o jedn¹ z przyczyn wybuchu I wojny œwiatowej. "Dreadnought" by³ pierwszym pancernikiem, który mia³ liczn¹ artyleriê g³ówn¹ ujednoliconego kalibru, w przeciwieñstwie do bezpoœrednio poprzedzaj¹cych go pancerników, które mia³y kilka dzia³ du¿ego kalibru i kilka lub kilkanaœcie dzia³ drugiego? mniejszego g³ównego kalibru oraz artyleriê œredni¹. By³ tak¿e pierwszym du¿ym okrêtem napêdzanym przez turbiny parowe, co sprawi³o, ¿e w momencie ukoñczenia budowy by³ najszybszym pancernikiem na œwiecie.

TEXT.English: In many historical societies, the position of kingship carries a sacral meaning, that is, it is identical with that of a high priest and of judge. The concept of theocracy is related, although a sacred king need not necessarily rule through his religious authority; rather, the temporal position itself has a religious significance.
TEXT.French: Dans de nombreuses sociétés historiques, la fonction royale revêt une signification sacrée, c'est-à-dire qu'elle est identique à celle d'un grand prêtre et d'un juge. Le concept de théocratie est lié, bien qu'un roi sacré ne doive pas nécessairement gouverner par son autorité religieuse ; plutôt, la position temporelle elle-même a une signification religieuse.

TEXT.English: Privateers were government-sanctioned pirate ships prominent from the seventeenth century until the nineteenth century. Pillaging for their lords in the shipping lanes of Europe or in the seas of the New World, Privateers bore no marking of their affiliation, making it impossible to trace their employer short of the "Letter of Marque" commissioning them.[PARAGRAPH:1]Successful Privateers, such as Sir Francis Drake in the employ of Queen Elisabeth I or Barbarossa under Sultan Suleiman I, wreaked havoc among the merchant vessels of rival nations, securing for themselves and their sovereigns significant, if second-hand, wealth. In the cases of both Barbarossa and Drake, the disruptive effect these naval bandits had upon the enemies of their lords helped ensure the naval supremacy of both the Ottoman Empire and England in their respective ages.
TEXT.French: Les navires corsaires, bateaux pirates mandatés par des gouvernements, connaissent leur heure de gloire entre le dix-septième et le dix-neuvième siècle. Pillant pour le compte de leurs seigneurs dans les eaux européennes ou celles du Nouveau monde, les corsaires ne portent aucune marque de leur affiliation ; il est donc impossible d'identifier leur employeur à moins de mettre la main sur la "lettre de marque" qui les commandite.[PARAGRAPH:1]De célèbres corsaires, comme Sir Francis Drake au service de la reine Elisabeth Ière, ou Barberousse sous le sultan Soliman Ier, font des ravages parmi les navires marchands des nations rivales, conquérant, pour eux et pour leurs souverains, des richesses considérables. Dans le cas de Barberousse et Drake, le chaos suscité par ces bandits des mers chez leurs ennemis a contribué à assurer la suprématie navale de l'empire ottoman et de l'Angleterre à leur époque respective.
TEXT.German: Freibeuter waren von der Regierung unterstützte Piratenschiffe, die es vom 17. bis zum 19. Jahrhundert gab. Für ihre Auftraggeber plünderten sie auf den Handelswegen Europas oder in den Ozeanen der Neuen Welt, und nichts wies auf ihre Zugehörigkeit hin. Dadurch war es ohne Kaperbrief unmöglich, ihren Auftraggeber auszumachen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Erfolgreiche Freibeuter, wie etwa Sir Francis Drake im Dienste von Königin Elisabeth I. oder Barbarossa unter Sultan Süleyman I., richteten große Zerstörung bei den Handelsschiffen rivalisierender Nationen an und sicherten dadurch sich selbst und ihren Oberhäuptern enormen Reichtum, wenn auch aus zweiter Hand. Im Fall von Barbarossa und Drake trug die Zerstörung, die diese Seeräuber bei den Feinden ihrer Auftraggeber anrichteten, zur Sicherung der Vormachtstellung der Marine des Osmanischen Reiches bzw. Englands in den entsprechenden Zeitaltern bei.
TEXT.Italian: Le Navi corsare erano navi pirata autorizzate dai governi importanti dal diciassettesimo al diciannovesimo secolo. Saccheggiando le rotte commerciali d'Europa o del Nuovo Mondo, i corsari non recavano segni di affiliazione, rendendo impossibile scoprire chi li impiegava a meno di leggere la "Lettera di Corsa" che avevano ricevuto.[PARAGRAPH:1]Corsari di successo come Sir Francis Drake, al servizio della Regina Elisabetta I o Barbarossa, sotto il Sultano Solimano I, seminavano distruzione tra vascelli mercantili delle nazioni rivali, conquistando per sé e per i propri sovrani importanti ricchezze, anche se di seconda mano. Nel caso di Barbarossa e Drake, l'effetto distruttivo che questi banditi navali ebbero sui nemici dei loro signori aiutò ad assicurare la supremazia navale dell'Inghilterra e dell'Impero Ottomano durante rispettivi periodi.
TEXT.Spanish: Los corsarios, barcos pirata financiados por diferentes gobiernos, existieron entre los siglos XVII y XIX. En sus ataques a las grandes rutas comerciales de Europa o en los mares del Nuevo Mundo, los corsarios no utilizaban ninguna bandera, por lo que era imposible localizar a sus auténticos patronos (salvo que cayese en manos enemigas la "patente de corso").[PARAGRAPH:1]Los corsarios más famosos, como Sir Francis Drake (al servicio de Isabel I) o Barbarroja (al de Solimán I), sembraron el caos entre los navíos mercantes de las naciones rivales, obteniendo para sus señores sustanciosas ganancias (aunque por persona interpuesta). En los casos de Barbarroja y Drake, los efectos que sus depredaciones tuvieron sobre los enemigos de sus señores contribuyeron a garantizar la supremacía naval del Imperio Otomano e Inglaterra en sus respectivas épocas.

TEXT.English: Procoptodon was a genus of giant short-faced kangaroo living in Australia during the Pleistocene epoch. P. goliah, the largest known kangaroo that ever existed, stood approximately 2 m (6.6 ft). They weighed about 230 kg (510 lb).[PARAGRAPH:2]Giant short-faced kangaroos had a flat face and forward-pointing eyes. On each foot they had a single large toe somewhat similar in appearance like a horse's hoof. On these unusual feet they moved quickly through the open forests and plains, where they sought grass and leaves to eat. Their front paws were equally strange: each front paw had two extra-long fingers with large claws. It is possible that they were used to grab branches, bringing leaves within eating distance. The genus was present until at least about 50,000 years ago before going extinct, although there is some evidence they may have survived to as recently as 18,000 years ago. Their demise is usually attributed to human activities, but this remains uncertain.[PARAGRAPH:2]Fossils of giant short-faced kangaroos have been found at the Naracoorte World Heritage fossil deposits in South Australia, Lake Menindee in New South Wales, Darling Downs in Queensland, and at many other sites. A full-size, lifelike replica is on permanent display with other ancient native Australian animals at the Australian Museum.[PARAGRAPH:2]The genus is paraphyletic, derived from Simosthenurus.
TEXT.German: Als [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Procoptodon[COLOR_REVERT] bezeichnet man eine Gattung der ausgestorbenen Kurzschnauzenkängurus, die bis ins Pleistozän in Australien lebten.[NEWLINE]Das Procoptodon goliah war die größte Art der Gattung. Es fiel durch seine enorme Körpergröße von 2 bis 3 m und die kurze Schnauze auf und wurde etwa 230 kg schwer. Zudem waren die Zehen der Hinterläufe stark zurückgebildet, was entfernt an die Entwicklung der Pferde erinnert. Vermutlich konnte das Procoptodon dadurch hohe Fluchtgeschwindigkeiten erreichen. Die Nahrung des Kängurus bestand wahrscheinlich aus raufaserigen Pflanzen.[NEWLINE]Die letzten Vertreter der Gattung verschwanden, wie auch andere Großsäuger Australiens, während der Quartären Aussterbewelle.

TEXT.English: As computerized AI systems become more and more put to use, electrical, EMP and hacking data sources, along with raw destructive force, emerge as unique threats to these systems. When hardware and software are damaged, highly technical programmers and IT fellows are employed to recover and salvage what can be repaired and returned to service. Nerds aren't the strongest units out there but they sure have their growing uses in an increasingly high-tech realm of warfare.
TEXT.French: Avec l'utilisation croissante de systèmes d'IA informatisés, les sources de données électriques, EMP et de piratage ainsi que la force destructrice brute émergent comme des menaces uniques pour ces systèmes. Lorsque le matériel et les logiciels sont endommagés, des programmeurs très techniques et des informaticiens sont employés pour récupérer et réparer ce qui peut être réparé et remis en service. Les geeks ne sont pas les unités les plus fortes, mais ils ont certainement leur utilité croissante dans un domaine de guerre de plus en plus high-tech.
TEXT.Polish: Programista, zwany te¿ potocznie koderem to osoba, która tworzy programy komputerowe w pewnym jêzyku programowania. Termin ten mo¿e odnosiæ siê tak¿e do specjalisty w jednej dziedzinie programowania. Wiêkszoœæ programistów zna co najmniej kilka jêzyków programowania (np. C, C++, Java), lecz specjalizuje siê tylko w wybranych z nich. Nazwa g³ównego jêzyka jest czêsto dodawana do nazwy stanowiska, np. programista C++, aby podkreœliæ specjalizacjê.

German.Text: Großer Prophet:Großen Propheten:Großen Propheten:Großen Propheten:Große Propheten:Großen Propheten:Großen Propheten:Großen Propheten

TEXT.English: The Panamanian Public Forces (Spanish: Fuerza Pública de la República de Panama) are the national security forces of Panama. Panama is the second country in Latin America (the other being Costa Rica) to permanently abolish standing armies, with Panama retaining a small para-military security force. This came as a result of a U.S. invasion that overthrew a military dictatorship which ruled Panama from 1968 to 1989. The final military dictator, Manuel Noriega, had been belligerent toward the U.S. culminating in the killing of a U.S. Marine lieutenant and U.S. invasion ordered by U.S. President George H. W. Bush.

Many of the Pueblo people harbored a latent hostility toward the Spanish, primarily due to their denigration and prohibition of the traditional religion. The traditional economies of the pueblos were likewise disrupted, the people having been forced to labor on the encomiendas of the colonists. On the other hand, the Spanish had introduced new farming implements and provided some measure of security against Navajo and Apache raiding parties. As a result, they lived in relative peace with the Spanish since the founding of the Northern New Mexican colony in 1598.

Pygmy, in anthropology, member of any human group whose adult males grow to less than 59 inches (150 cm) in average height. A member of a slightly taller group is termed pygmoid. Virtually all Pygmy peoples are hunters and gatherers, practicing neither agriculture nor cattle raising. Most maintain close symbiotic relations with other groups in their region; consequently most have lost their indigenous languages and adopted that of their neighbours.

Qaboos bin Said Al Busaidi is the Sultan of Oman. He rose to power after overthrowing his father, Said bin Taimur, in a palace coup in 1970. He is the 14th-generation descendant of the founder of the Al Bu Sa'idi dynasty.
TEXT.French: Qaboos bin Said Al Busaidi est le Sultan d'Oman. Il est monté au pouvoir après avoir renversé son père, Said bin Taimur, lors d'un coup d'État en 1970. Il est le descendant de la 14e génération du fondateur de la dynastie Al Bu Sa'idi.

TEXT.English: The Chavín culture also demonstrated advanced skills and knowledge in metallurgy, soldering, and temperature control. They used early techniques to develop refined gold work. The melting of metal had been discovered at this point and was used as a solder.
TEXT.French: La culture Chavín a également démontré des compétences avancées en métallurgie, brasage et contrôle de la température. Ils utilisaient des techniques primitives pour développer un travail d'or raffiné. La fusion des métaux était découverte à cette époque et était utilisée comme soudure.

TEXT.English: The Pikeman of the Qiang culture in China developed the art of the pike to a level comparable with the legendary pikemen of Switzerland.
TEXT.French: Le piqueur de la culture Qiang en Chine développa l'art de la pique à un niveau comparable à celui des légendaires piqueurs suisses.
TEXT.Italian: I picchieri della cultura Qiang svilupparono la costruzione di picche ad un livello comparabile a quello dei leggendari picchieri svizzeri.

TEXT.English: Q-ships, were decoy vessels are heavily armed merchant ships with concealed weaponry, designed to lure submarines into making surface attacks. This gave Q-ships the chance to open fire and sink them. They were used by the British and the United States during World War 2, as a countermeasure against German U-boats and Japanese submarines. A Q-ship would appear to be an easy target, but in fact carried hidden armaments. Once the U-boat was vulnerable, the Q-ship's panels would drop to reveal the deck guns, which would immediately open fire. With the element of surprise, a U-boat could be quickly overwhelmed. Q-ships were responsible for about 10% of all U-boats sunk, ranking them well below the use of ordinary minefields in effectiveness. Attacks on merchant ships by pirates originating on the Somalia coast have brought suggestions from some security experts that Q-ships be used again to tempt pirates into attacking a well defended ship.

TEXT.English: The Mocov are an indigenous tribe of the Gran Chaco. They live in Chaco Province and Santa Fe Province of Argentina.
TEXT.French: Les Mocov sont une tribu indigène du Gran Chaco. Ils vivent dans la province de Chaco et la province de Santa Fe en Argentine.

TEXT.English: Early European explorers noted the physical differences among groups of Pacific Islanders. In 1756 Charles de Brosses theorized that there was an 'old black race' in the Pacific who were conquered or defeated by the peoples of what is now called Polynesia, whom he distinguished as having lighter skin.:189-190 By 1825 Jean Baptiste Bory de Saint-Vincent developed a more elaborate, 15-race model of human diversity. He described the inhabitants of modern-day Melanesia as Mélaniens, a distinct racial group from the Australian and Neptunian (i.e. Polynesian) races surrounding them.:178

Quang Trung was the Emperor name of a man known as Nguyen Hue. He was the second emperor of the Tay Son Dynasty of Vietnam, reigning from 1788 until 1792. He was also one of the most successful military commanders in Vietnam's history and was undefeated in battle. At the time of his death, Vietnam was unified for the first time in three centuries. Nguyen Hue and his brothers, together known as the Tay Son Brothers, were the leaders of the famous Tay Son Rebellion. As rebels they conquered Vietnam, overthrowing the imperial Later Le Dynasty and the two rival feudal houses of the Nguyen in the south and the Trinh in the north. After several years of constant military campaigning and rule, Nguyen Hue died at the age of 40, possibly due to a stroke. Prior to his death, he had made plans to continue his march southwards in order to destroy the army of Nguyen Anh, a surviving heir of the Nguyen Lords. Nguyen Hue's death led to the downfall of the Tay Son Dynasty. His successors were unable to follow the plans he had made for ruling Vietnam. However, his conquests marked the beginning of approximately a century in which Vietnam was both unified and independent until the French conquest of Vietnam in 1885. Nguyen Hue has become the national savior of Vietnam and the most popular figure in the country; many Vietnamese believe - whether rightfully or not - that had not Quang Trung died at such a young age, Vietnam may have developed itself into the dominant power of Southeast Asia, thus changing history for the betterment of Vietnam.
TEXT.Polish: Quang Trung bylo cesarskim imieniem cz³owieka znanego jako Nguyen Hue. By³ drugim cesarzem Wietnamu z dynastii Tay Son, rz¹dz¹c w latach 1788 - 1792. By³ równie¿ jednym z najlepszych dowódców wojskowych w historii Wietnamu i nigdy nie zosta³ pokonany w bitwie. W momencie jego œmierci, Wietnam po raz pierwszy od trzech wieków by³ zjednoczony.

TEXT.English: In 1837, residents of Lower Canada - led by Louis-Joseph Papineau and Robert Nelson - formed an armed resistance group to seek an end to the unilateral control of the British governors. They made a Declaration of Rights with equality for all citizens without discrimination and a Declaration of Independence of Lower-Canada in 1838. Their actions resulted in rebellions in both Lower and Upper Canada. An unprepared British Army had to raise militia force; the rebel forces scored a victory in Saint-Denis but were soon defeated.

In the great wars of the 5th century BC, such as the Persian Wars and the Peloponnesian War, the trireme was the heaviest type of warship used by the Mediterranean navies. The trireme (Greek: trie-re-s, "three-oared") was propelled by three banks of oars, with one oarsman each. During the early 4th century BC however, variants of the trireme design began to appear: the invention of the quinquereme (Gk. pente-re-s, "five-oared") and the hexareme (Gk. hexe-re-s, "six-oared") is credited by the historian Diodorus Siculus to the tyrant Dionysius I of Syracuse, while the quadrireme (Gk. tetre-re-s, "four-oared") was credited by Aristotle to the Carthaginians.
TEXT.Polish: Rzymska galera, prawdopodobnie mia³a dwa lub trzy rzêdy wiose³. Jej nazwa, piêciorzêdowiec, bierze siê st¹d, ¿e ka¿de wios³o obs³ugiwa³o piêæ osób. Za³ogê okrêtu w III w. przed Chrystusem stanowi³o 300 wioœlarzy i 120 ¿o³nierzy.

TEXT.English: A [BOLD]Quinquereme[\BOLD] is a type of ancient oar-propelled warship that was used by the Greeks of the Hellenistic period and later by the Carthaginians and Romans, from the 4th century BC to the 1st century. It was developed from the earlier trireme. [NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:1]Quinqueremes were even more difficult to make stable than triremes, and the increase in speed was not so great as to give the larger galleys much of an advantage. Therefore smaller navies had a core of trireme warships, while bigger navies like Egypt, Rome and Carthage were able to afford a large number of quinqueremes and polyremes. Their advantage was the protection against ramming attacks and the larger body of marines. Comparing the effect of multiple man oars to one man oars you have to look at several men as not fully participating. Because of the restricted movement a large number of rowers did not propel the vessel with as much of their musclepower as on a one man oar. At this time the Greek homeland had declined as a naval power. Only Macedonia's uniting rule was able to afford these juggernauts in larger numbers and with its decline the fleet had to use cheaper triremes again to keep at least a large number of ships in the battleline. But this type of ship had changed into a heavier warship with the rowers now all protected under deck, much more firepower and marines.
TEXT.French: Une quinquereme est une galère antique propulsée par rames, une version améliorée de la trireme. Utilisée par les Grecs durant la période Hellenique, puis par les Carthages et les Romains, du 4ème siècle au 1er siècle av. JC. La version de siège s'apparente à deux Trirèmes fixées ensemble et montées d'une tour, armée de catapultes. La quinquereme de siège a été utilisée comme engin de bombardement naval par les Romains lors des Guerres Puniques.
TEXT.Italian: Una quinquereme è una nave da guerra spinta da remi, sviluppata dalla precedente trireme. E 'stata utilizzata dai greci del periodo ellenistico e successivamente da Cartaginesi e Romani, dal 4 ° secolo a.C. al 1 ° secolo. Una quinquereme da assedio è composta di due triremi, unite e sormontate da una torre, armate con più catapulte. La quinquereme da assedio è stata utilizzata come un mezzo di bombardamento navale dai Romani durante le guerre puniche
TEXT.Polish: A [BOLD]Pentera[\BOLD] inaczej piêciorzêdowiec by³ to typ okrêtu u¿ywanego w staro¿ytnoœci przez Greków, Fenicjan, a w okresie od wojen punickich, tak¿e przez Rzymian. By³ bardzo podobny do triremy, lecz znacznie od niej wiêkszy.[NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:1]Pentera by³a wyposa¿ona w dwa maszty ustawione na dziobie ukoœnie i posiada³a o¿aglowanie rejowe. TEXT.English: The quoll (genus Dasyurus) is a carnivorous marsupial native to mainland Australia, New Guinea and Tasmania. It is primarily nocturnal and spends most of the day in its den. There are six species of quoll; four are found in Australia and two in New Guinea. Another two species are known from fossil remains in Pliocene and Pleistocene deposits in Queensland. Genetic evidence indicates that the quoll evolved around 15 million years ago in the Miocene, and that the ancestors of the six species had all diverged by around 4 million years ago. The quoll species vary in weight and size, from 300 grams (11 oz) to 7 kilograms (15 lb). They have brown or black fur and a pink nose. They are largely solitary but come together for a few social interactions such as mating which occurs during the winter season. A female gives birth to up to 18 pups, of which only 6 survive to suckle on her teats.[PARAGRAPH:2]The quoll eats small mammals such as rabbits, small birds, lizards and insects. Its natural lifespan is between two and five years. All species have drastically declined in numbers since Australasia was colonised by Europeans, with one species, the Eastern quoll, becoming extinct on the Australian mainland, now being found only in Tasmania. Major threats to their survival include the cane toad, predators, urban development and poison baiting. Conservation efforts include breeding programs in captivity.
TEXT.German: Die Gattung der [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Beutelmarder[COLOR_REVERT] umfasst sechs Arten, die nicht mit den plazentalen Mardern verwandt sind. Gelegentlich wird auch die englische Bezeichnung Quoll verwendet.[NEWLINE]Das Fell der Beutelmarder ist grau oder braun mit weißen Flecken. Die Körperlänge (ohne Schwanz) variiert je nach Art von 25 bis 75 cm. Der Riesenbeutelmarder kann bis zu 3 kg schwer werden. Beutelmarder gibt es in ganz Australien sowie in Neuguinea, auf Tasmanien und anderen Inseln. Sie sind nachtaktiv und verbringen den Tag in Höhlen, Erdlöchern oder hohlen Baumstämmen. Obwohl sie Bodenbewohner sind, können sie gut klettern. Sie bewohnen sowohl trockene als auch felsige Gebiete sowie Wälder. Beutelmarder sind Raubtiere, ernähren sich aber auch manchmal von Früchten und anderen Pflanzenteilen sowie Aas. Der Beutel ist nicht voll ausgebildet und wird meist nur während der Tragezeit angelegt. Nach der Geburt bleiben Jungtiere solange im Beutel, bis sie herausgewachsen sind (7 bis 15 Wochen).[NEWLINE]Durch menschliche Besiedlung, Jagd und eingeschleppte Nahrungskonkurrenz ist das Verbreitungsgebiet der Beutelmarder eingeschränkt worden. Vier der sechs Arten gelten als gefährdet.

Pokryty jest miêkk¹, krótk¹ i gêst¹ sierœci¹. Ow³osiony ogon osi¹ga d³ugoœæ 21-30 cm. Nie³azy wystêpuj¹ w dwóch typach ubarwienia.
