TEXT.English: The advantages of a long, sharp blade in battle had to await advanced smelting and casting technologies before they could be realized. By about 1500 BC the war ax had evolved into the sickle sword, a bronze sword with a curved, concave blade and a straight, thickened handle. Bronze swords with straight blades more than three feet long have been found in Greek grave sites; however, because this length exceeded the tensile strength of bronze, these swords were not practical. As a serious military weapon, the sword had to await the development of ironworking, and the first true swords date from about 1200 BC. Swords in antiquity and classical times tended to be relatively short, at first because they were made of bronze and later because they were rarely called upon to penetrate armor. The blade of the classic Roman stabbing sword, the gladius, was only some two feet long, though in the twilight years of the empire the gladius gave way to the spatha, the long slashing sword of the barbarians and forerunner of the great broadswords of medieval Europe.
TEXT.French: Il faudra attendre le développement des techniques de fonte et de coulage pour pouvoir façonner des lames longues et affûtées. Vers 1 500 av. J.-C., la hache de guerre est remplacée par l'épée-faucille, une épée en bronze à la lame courbe, et au manche droit et renforcé. On a découvert, dans des tombeaux grecs, des épées en bronze à lame droite, longues de plus d'un mètre. Mais cette longueur excédant la résistance d'étirement du bronze, ces épées étaient peu pratiques. Il faudra attendre le développement de la sidérurgie pour voir apparaître les premières véritables épées. Celles-ci datent d'environ 1 200 av. J.-C. Les épées de l'Antiquité et de l'époque Classique étaient relativement courtes, au départ car elles étaient en bronze, puis plus tard, parce qu'elles n'étaient pas destinées à pénétrer des armures. L'épée romaine, le glaive, ne faisait que 60 cm de long. Mais vers la fin de l'empire, il est progressivement remplacé par la spathe, l'épée longue des barbares, ancêtre des épées à deux tranchants de l'Europe médiévale.
TEXT.German: Bis die Vorzüge einer langen, scharfen Klinge auf dem Schlachtfeld genutzt werden konnten, mussten zunächst einmal fortschrittliche Schmelz- und Gussverfahren erdacht werden. Um etwa 1500 vor Christus hatte man das Kriegsbeil zum Sichelschwert weiterentwickelt, ein Bronzeschwert mit einer konkav gebogenen Klinge und einem geraden, verdickten Griff. In griechischen Grabstätten fand man Bronzeschwerter, deren gerade geformte Klingen knapp einen Meter lang waren. Weil die Festigkeit der Bronze für eine solche Klingenlänge normalerweise aber nicht ausreichte, waren diese Schwerter nicht unbedingt praxistauglich. Stattdessen sollte es noch bis zum Aufkommen der Eisenverarbeitung dauern, bis das Schwert als vollwertige Kampfwaffe eingesetzt werden konnte. Die ersten wirklich einsatzfähigen Kampfschwerter datieren entsprechend aus der Zeit um 1200 vor Christus. Die Schwerter des Altertums waren relativ kurz - zuerst, weil sie aus Bronze gefertigt waren und später, weil sie nur selten dazu benutzt werden mussten, um Rüstungen zu durchstoßen. Die Klinge des klassischen römischen Stichschwerts, des so genannten Gladius, war lediglich etwa 60 Zentimeter lang. Diese Waffe wurde in den späteren Jahren des Römischen Reiches von dem zweischneidigen Langschwert der Barbaren abgelöst, dem so genannten Spatha. Diese Variante war der Vorläufer der großen europäischen Breitschwerter des Mittelalters.
TEXT.Italian: Prima di vedere in battaglia i vantaggi derivanti da una lama lunga e affilata bisognò aspettare lo sviluppo di tecnologie avanzate di fusione e di forgia. Intorno al 1500 a. C., l'ascia da guerra lasciò il posto alla spada a falce, una spada di bronzo con una lama curva, concava, e una grossa impugnatura diritta. In alcuni cimiteri greci sono state trovate delle spade di bronzo con lame diritte, lunghe più di 90 centimetri. Tuttavia, poiché questa lunghezza superava la resistenza tensile del bronzo, queste spade non erano pratiche. Per diventare una seria arma militare, la spada dovette attendere lo sviluppo della lavorazione del ferro, i cui primi veri esemplari risalgono al 1200 a. C. Nell'antichità e nel periodo classico, la spada tendeva a essere relativamente corta, dapprima poiché era fatta di bronzo e in seguito perché era raramente usata per penetrare l'armatura. La lama della classica spada romana, il gladio, era lunga solo 60 centimetri, anche se negli ultimi anni dell'Impero dovette cedere il posto alla "spatha", l'affilata spada lunga dei barbari, nonché precursore degli spadoni dell'Europa Medievale.
TEXT.Spanish: Para que se dispusiera de las ventajas en el combate de una hoja larga y afilada, hubo que esperar a las avanzadas tecnologías de fundición y vaciado. Hacia el año 1.500 a. C., el hacha de guerra había evolucionado hasta la espada de hoz, una espada de bronce con una hoja curva y cóncava y un mango recto y reforzado. Se han encontrado en tumbas griegas espadas de bronce de hojas rectas de más de noventa centímetros; sin embargo, como esta longitud excedía la resistencia a la fractura del bronce, no resultaban prácticas. Como arma militar seria, la espada tuvo que esperar al desarrollo de la metalurgia; las primeras espadas de verdad datan del año 1200 a. C. En la antigüedad, las espadas tendían a ser relativamente cortas, al principio porque estaban hechas de bronce, y después porque raramente estaban destinadas a penetrar la armadura. La hoja de la espada romana clásica, el gladius, solo tenía sesenta centímetros de largo, aunque en los años finales del imperio dio paso a la spatha, la larga espada de los bárbaros que fue la predecesora de las grandes espadas de la Europa medieval.

TEXT.English: It is theorized that eventually man and machine may blend into something unrecognizable as either one. The systems analysts may well be the first real step into that direction. AI and Human Brain are fused into a dynamic harmony within the body of a man that is often cybortronically enhanced in many ways to assist with mobility and utility. But the brave souls that have given themselves to the project, many not so brave as simply clones of previous successes, have done so in the effort to generate the ultimate analytical intelligence. They spend most of their time in code analysis reverie, debugging, fixing, improving, designing deeper and deeper automated intelligence. They've found ways to directly teach Human minds and enable true innovations in AI structures.
TEXT.Polish: Analiza systemowa jest szczególnie przydatna do z³o¿onych zadañ w szybko zmiennym otoczeniu, typowym dla naszych czasów. Jest ona formalnym i jawnym badaniem wspomagaj¹cym dzia³anie osób odpowiedzialnych za decyzje lub liniê postêpowania w okreœlonej (z³o¿onej) sytuacji charakteryzuj¹cej siê niepewnoœci¹. Ma na celu okreœlenie po¿¹danego dzia³ania lub linii postêpowania przez rozpoznanie i rozwa¿enie dostêpnych wariantów oraz porównanie ich przewidywanych nastêpstw.
TEXT.Russian: Предполагается, что со временем человек и машина могут слиться во что-то неузнаваемое как одно целое. Системные аналитики вполне могут стать первым реальным шагом в этом направлении. Искусственный интеллект и человеческий мозг сливаются в динамическую гармонию в теле человека, которая часто кибортронно улучшается многими способами, чтобы способствовать мобильности и полезности. Но храбрые души, которые отдали себя проекту, многие из которых не были столь храбрыми, как просто клоны предыдущих успехов, сделали это, стремясь генерировать высший аналитический интеллект. Они проводят большую часть своего времени в задумчивости анализа кода, отладки, исправления, улучшения, разработки все более и более глубокого автоматизированного интеллекта. Они нашли способы напрямую обучать человеческий разум и внедрять настоящие инновации в структуры ИИ.

German.Text: Taktische Atomrakete:Taktischen Atomrakete:Taktischen Atomrakete:Taktische Atomrakete:Taktische Atomraketen:Taktischen Atomraketen:Taktischen Atomraketen:Taktischen Atomraketen

TEXT.English: The term "Tactical Nuclear Weapon" describes all non-strategic methods of nuclear-weapon delivery, including short-range nuclear missiles, bombs or artillery shells. These weapons can carry a variety of payloads, ranging anywhere from .1 kiloton to 1 megaton. While no tactical nuke has ever been detonated - unlike its strategic cousin - it is believed that a number of nuclear-capable nations have them in their arsenals.[PARAGRAPH:1]Used for specific engagements rather than long-term deterrence, tactical nukes tend to be only a few times greater in destructive power than their conventional-explosive counterparts, allowing a more efficient, but less widespread, effect. This permits commanders to deploy tactical nukes on the field of battle in conjunction with a conventional assault without fear of overtly harming their own troops.
TEXT.French: Le terme "arme nucléaire tactique" décrit toutes les méthodes non stratégiques de frappe nucléaire, dont les missiles nucléaires à courte portée, les bombes ou les obus d'artillerie. Ces armes se caractérisent par des charges variées, allant de 1 kilotonne à 1 mégatonne. Même si aucune arme nucléaire tactique n'a jamais explosé (contrairement à sa cousine stratégique), elles feraient partie de l'arsenal de nombreuses nations nucléaires.[PARAGRAPH:1]Utilisées pour des combats spécifiques plutôt que pour une dissuasion à long terme, les armes nucléaires tactiques ont tendance à n'être que légèrement plus puissantes que les armes nucléaires conventionnelles, ce qui leur confère plus d'efficacité, mais aussi plus de précision. Cela permet de déployer des armes nucléaires tactiques en association avec une attaque conventionnelle, sans craindre de toucher trop durement les troupes alliées.
TEXT.German: Der Begriff "taktische Nuklearwaffe" beschreibt alle nicht-strategischen Methoden des Nuklearwaffenangriffs, inklusive Kurzstrecken-Nuklearraketen, Atombomben oder Nuklear-Artilleriegranaten. Diese Waffen können die verschiedensten Nutzlasten mit sich führen, im Bereich von 100 Tonnen bis zu einer Megatonne. Bisher ist zwar noch keine taktische Nuklearwaffe detoniert - im Gegensatz zu ihrem strategischen Pendant - aber es wird behauptet, dass einige Atommächte über diese Waffen verfügen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Taktische Nuklearwaffen dienen eher zum gezielten Einsatz als zur langfristigen Abschreckung, und ihre Zerstörungskraft ist im Normalfall nur ein paar Mal stärker als die ihrer Gegenstücke mit herkömmlichem Sprengstoff. Ihre Wirkung ist effizienter, aber weniger breit gestreut. Das erlaubt Kommandanten den Einsatz von Nuklearwaffen auf dem Schlachtfeld in Verbindung mit einem konventionellen Angriff, ohne dabei den eigenen Truppen Schaden zuzufügen.
TEXT.Italian: Il termine "Arma nucleare tattica" descrive ogni tipo di impiego non strategico di armi nucleari, inclusi missili nucleari a corto raggio, bombe o proiettili di artiglieria. Tali armi possono utilizzare diverse cariche esplosive, a partire da 0,1 kilotoni fino ad arrivare a un megatone. Anche se non è mai stata esplosa alcuna arma nucleare tattica, si crede che un certo numero di nazioni le abbiano nel proprio arsenale.[PARAGRAPH:1]Usate per scontri ben precisi più che come deterrente a lunga distanza, le armi nucleari tattiche sono di poche volte più distruttive delle controparti tradizionali; sono più efficienti ma hanno un effetto meno esteso. Ciò permette ai comandanti di utilizzare armi nucleari tattiche sul campo di battaglia assieme a un assalto convenzionale, senza paura di danneggiare apertamente le proprie truppe.
TEXT.Spanish: El término "arma nuclear táctica" describe todos los métodos no estratégicos de utilizar armas nucleares, incluidos los misiles de corto alcance, las bombas o los proyectiles de artillería. Estas armas pueden llevar cabezas de diferente potencia, desde 0,1 kilotones hasta 1 megatón. Aunque las armas nucleares tácticas nunca se han utilizado (a diferencia de las estratégicas) se cree que los arsenales nucleares de varios países cuentan con ellas.[PARAGRAPH:1]Usadas con fines ofensivos específicos y no como medios de disuasión, normalmente las cabezas nucleares tácticas no son mucho más potentes que sus contrapartidas convencionales, lo que permite darles un uso más eficiente, aunque menos destructivo, que a las estratégicas. Esto permite a los comandantes desplegar cabezas tácticas en el campo de batalla y emplearlas junto al resto de su arsenal sin miedo a destruir sus propias tropas.

TEXT.English: Taejo of Joseon (October 27, 1335 - June 18, 1408), born Yi Seong-gye, whose changed name is Yi Dan, was the founder and the first king of the Joseon Dynasty of Korea reigning from 1392 to 1398, and the main figure in overthrowing the Goryeo Dynasty. He was posthumously raised to the rank of Emperor in 1899 by Gojong, the Gwangmu Emperor, who had proclaimed the Korean Empire in 1897.
TEXT.French: Taejo de Joseon (27 octobre 1335 - 18 juin 1408), né Yi Seong-gye, rebaptisé Yi Dan, fut le fondateur et premier roi de la dynastie Joseon en Corée, régnant de 1392 à 1398, et le principal acteur du renversement de la dynastie Goryeo. Il fut élevé posthumément au rang d'Empereur en 1899 par Gojong, l'empereur Gwangmu, qui proclama l'empire coréen en 1897.

TEXT.English: Taharqa (reigned ca. 688-ca. 663 B.C.) was a Nubian pharaoh of Egypt. He was the last ruler of the Twenty-fifth Dynasty, the so-called Ethiopian Dynasty, and was driven out of Lower Egypt by the Assyrians as they began to conquer Egypt. When Shabaka conquered Lower Egypt and thus asserted Nubian rule, he was accompanied by his nephew Taharqa, who was about age 20. Later, during Shabaka's reign as pharaoh, Egypt confronted the growing might of Assyria on the battlefield. Taharqa was at the head of the Egyptian army, but it is not clear whether the two forces actually fought. Taharqa's brother Shabataka succeeded Shabaka, and he made Taharqa his coregent in order to assure his succession. About 688 B.C., approximately 23 years after Nubian rule had been imposed over Egypt, Taharqa assumed the throne in his own right. The next few years were peaceful, and Taharqa moved his capital to Tanis in the Delta so that he could stay well informed about events in the neighboring Asian countries. By 671 B.C. Egypt and Assyria again approached a confrontation, so Taharqa prepared to fight for the continued survival of Egypt. But the Assyrian king, Esarhaddon, crossed the Sinai Desert and defeated Taharqa's army on the frontier. In 2 weeks he was besieging Memphis. The Egyptian army crumbled under the attack of the better-disciplined Assyrian army, which was armed with iron weapons. Taharqa fled to Upper Egypt, leaving Esarhaddon to take control of Lower Egypt. Two years later Taharqa returned with a fresh army and managed to recover control of the Delta, but this success was short-lived, and Esar-haddon's successor, Ashurbanipal, drove Taharqa south again. After this final defeat he never again tried to campaign in the north. Egypt then entered into a long era of successive foreign rulers. During his period of Egyptian rule Taharqa had encouraged many architectural projects, as had his Nubian predecessors. He erected monuments at Karnak, Thebes, and Tanis in Lower Egypt, and he built a number of important temples in Cush, as the Upper Egyptian Nubian state was then known. During the last 8 years of his life in Cush, he continued to foster his architectural interests. In 663 B.C. Taharqa accepted as a coregent Tanutamon, whose precise relationship to him is not clear. The next year Taharqa died and was buried in a pyramid in Nuri. Tanutamon had immediately invaded Lower Egypt himself when he was named coregent, and he managed to gain control of it for almost a decade, only to be driven out by the Assyrians, as Taharqa had been. Although the Nubians had managed to rule Egypt for only about 75 years, their kingdom of Cush in the northern Sudan survived for almost a millennium.
TEXT.Polish: Taharka - w³adca kuszycki rezyduj¹cy w Napacie, oraz faraon - w³adca staro¿ytnego Egiptu z czasów koñca Trzeciego Okresu Przejœciowego, zaliczany do XXV dynastii kuszyckiej, rezyduj¹cy pocz¹tkowo w Tebach, a nastêpnie w Memfis i Tanis. By³ m³odszym synem Pianchiego i królewskiej ma³¿onki Abale, m³odszym bratem Szabataki, nastêpc¹ Szabataki na tronie kuszyckim oraz tronie faraonów, ojcem Atlanersa, za³o¿yciela dynastii rodzimych w³adców napatañskich.Samodzieln¹ w³adzê w Egipcie sprawowa³ w latach 690-664 p.n.e., jednak¿e mo¿na go uwa¿aæ za w³adcê ju¿ od pocz¹tkowych lat panowania Szabataki. Po œmierci Szabataki, która wed³ug Manetona nast¹pi³a z r¹k Taharki, przeniós³ on oœrodek w³adzy do Tanis, zdaj¹c sobie sprawê z tego, i¿ jedynie stamt¹d mo¿e skutecznie przeciwstawiæ siê narastaj¹cemu zagro¿eniu ze strony Asyrii. W³adzê w Tebach pozostawi³ swemu zaufanemu krewnemu - Montuemhatowi, który posiada³ jedynie tytularn¹ godnoœæ kap³ana i czwartego proroka Amona, a w rzeczywistoœci sprawowa³ funkcjê gubernatora Górnego Egiptu i burmistrza Teb oraz swej siostrze Szepenupet II, boskiej ma³¿once Amona, która sprawowa³a w³adzê duchown¹. Po objêciu w³adzy ca³¹ sw¹ energiê skierowa³ Taharka na unormowanie spraw administracyjnych i gospodarczych kraju. Okaza³ siê on doskona³ym organizatorem i sprawnym wykonawc¹ podjêtych planów, co wkrótce zaowocowa³o osi¹gniêciem wzglêdnej stabilizacji w Górnym Egipcie. Efektem tego by³ szeroki program budowlany realizowany g³ównie w Karnaku - uchodzi za jednego z g³ównych autorów przebudowy - i Medinet Habu oraz wielu oœrodkach kultu w Górnym Egipcie i Nubii, m.in. w Napacie,gdzie rozbudowa³ œwi¹tyniê Amona, w Meroe, Kawa, Semna, Kasr Ibrim, Buhen, Faras oraz na File, ale równie¿ w Delcie w Athribis. O ile sytuacja w Górnym Egipcie osi¹gnê³a stan wzglêdnej stabilizacji, charakteryzuj¹cy siê zjednoczeniem i wzmocnieniem w³adzy oraz rozwojem gospodarczym, o tyle w pó³nocnej czêœci Egiptu nadal by³a niezwykle skomplikowana g³ównie za przyczyn¹ rozbicia dzielnicowego - podzia³u w³adzy oraz roszczeniami do w³adzy licznych rodów ksi¹¿êcych oraz nieustannym zagro¿eniem ze strony Asyrii.

TEXT.English: Tahiti was originally settled by Polynesians between 300 and 800 CE. They represent about 70% of the island's population with the rest made up of Europeans, Chinese and those of mixed heritage. The island was part of the Kingdom of Tahiti until its annexation by France in 1880, when it was proclaimed a colony of France. It was not until 1946 that the indigenous Tahitians were legally authorised to be French citizens. French is the only official language although the Tahitian language (Reo Tahiti) is widely spoken.

In 1599, the Tairona revolted against the Spanish, apparently because economic and religious pressure from the Spanish had become intolerable. The main aggression was the killing of priests and travellers along the roads connecting the Spanish city of Santa Marta and the Tairona centers of Bonda and the villages of Concha and Chengue. Secondary targets were the churches and houses of known bureaucrats of the colonial administration. However these data are from Spanish testimonies from the trial against the Tairona chiefs in 1602. The Chiefs of Chengue and Bonda were sentenced to death, their bodies dismembered, their villages burned, the populations relocated and incorporated into the Encomienda system. By the mid-17th century, many Tairona populations were completely abandoned and the region was engulfed by forest.

There are some correspondences or putative borrowings between the Yamana and Selknam mythologies. The hummingbird was an animal revered by the Yamanas, and the Taiyin creation myth explaining the creation of the archipelago's water system, the culture hero "Taiyin" is portrayed in the guise of a hummingbird. A Yamana myth, "The egoist fox", features a hummingbird as a helper and has some similarities to the Taiyin-myth of the Selk'nam. Similar remarks apply to the myth about the big albatross: it shares identical variants for both tribes.

The rise in the use of semi-automatic and automatic firearms in the late 19th and early 20th century led to the demise of horse-mounted cavalry. As a result, attackers lost a significant advantage in both scouting and deployment. It was only with the development of tanks, armored mobile attack vehicles equipped with high caliber-guns, that a weapon was found which could once more punch a hole through enemy field forces. First appearing in World War I, armored attack vehicles move quickly and strike with power, while still possessing an effective defensive strength. Tanks are powerful weapon against any ground unit.
TEXT.French: L'utilisation croissante des armes automatiques et semi-automatiques à la fin du XIXe et au début du XXe siècle, sonna le glas de la cavalerie à cheval. De ce fait, les troupes offensives perdirent un atout important, que ce soit pour la reconnaissance ou pour l'attaque. Ce n'est qu'avec l'apparition des chars d'assaut, lors de la Première Guerre mondiale, que les armées disposèrent à nouveau d'une arme capable de percer en force les lignes ennemies. Les chars d'assaut sont des véhicules d'attaque blindés équipés de canons à gros calibre. Ils sont capables de se déplacer rapidement, disposent d'une puissance de feu importante et sont efficacement protégés par leur blindage. Les chars d'assaut sont particulièrement redoutables contre les troupes d'infanterie.
TEXT.German: Der im späten 19. und frühen 20. Jahrhundert weltweit vermehrte Einsatz halbautomatischer und automatischer Waffen besiegelte das Ende der Kavallerie und Angreifer verloren dadurch ihre bisherigen Vorzüge bei Erkundungs- und Angriffsfeldzügen. Erst mit der Entwicklung von Panzern bzw. gepanzerten mobilen Angriffsfahrzeugen, die mit hochkalibrigen Geschützen ausgestattet waren, war es wieder möglich geworden, durch die feindlichen Bodentruppen vorzustoßen. Erstmalig traten gepanzerte Angriffsfahrzeuge im 1. Weltkrieg in Aktion. Während sie sich schnell fortbewegen und mit verheerender Schlagkraft angreifen konnten, wiesen sie gleichzeitig eine wirksame Defensivstärke auf. Panzer sind eine mächtige Waffe gegen jede feindliche Bodeneinheit.
TEXT.Italian: Il maggiore uso delle armi da fuoco automatiche e semiautomatiche nel tardo XIX secolo e all'inizio del XX secolo portò alla fine della cavalleria. Di conseguenza, gli attaccanti persero un vantaggio significativo sia dal punto di vista dell'esplorazione che nello spiegamento. Fu solo con lo sviluppo dei carri armati, veicoli d'attacco corazzati dotati di cannoni di grosso calibro, che venne trovata un'arma che potesse nuovamente aprire una breccia nelle truppe nemiche. Apparsi per la prima volta nella Prima Guerra Mondiale, i veicoli d'attacco corazzato si muovevano rapidamente e attaccavano con efficacia, riuscendo nel contempo a difendersi validamente. I carri armati sono potenti armi contro qualsiasi tipo di unità di terra.
TEXT.Spanish: El triunfo de las armas de fuego automáticas y semiautomáticas, a finales del XIX y principios del XX, provocó el declive de la caballería. Como consecuencia, los atacantes perdieron una ventaja significativa en la exploración y el despliegue de tropas. Hasta la aparición de los tanques, vehículos blindados de ataque equipados con cañones de gran calibre, no volvió a verse un arma capaz de abrir una brecha en las líneas enemigas. Los vehículos ofensivos blindados, dotados de gran movilidad sin menoscabo de su capacidad defensiva, aparecieron por primera vez en la Primera Guerra Mundial. Los tanques son armas poderosas contra cualquier unidad de tierra.

TEXT.English: Tarascan capital was located at Tzintzuntzan on the banks of Lake Patzcuaro, and, according to Purépecha oral tradition was founded by the first cazonci Tariacuri and dominated by his lineage, the "Uacúsecha" ("Eagles" in Purépecha language).
TEXT.French: La capitale tarasque était située à Tzintzuntzan sur les rives du lac Patzcuaro et, selon la tradition orale purépecha, fut fondée par le premier cazonci, Tariacuri, et dominée par sa lignée, les « Uacúsecha » (« Aigles » en langue purépecha).

TEXT.English: The use of the stirrup by the Huns gave them a technological advantage against other armies when they advanced toward the west in the 3rd century. They could set themselves in their stirrups and charge into a target with a lance. The impact of the lance point transferred the force of the combined moving man and horse, thanks to the stirrup. With rare exceptions (notably Alexander's Companion cavalry) horsemen prior to this had rarely been effective with a lance or spear. The appearance of thousands of barbarian cavalry using spears so effectively forced dramatic change in warfare at the end of antiquity. The Roman legions were forced to put more emphasis on cavalry in support of their legions and eventually hire barbarian horsemen as mercenaries. Heroes of Hunnic, and later Mongolian, armies were known as Tarkans.

The Winter War was a military conflict between the Soviet Union and Finland in 1939-1940. It began with the Soviet invasion of Finland on 30 November 1939 (three months after the outbreak of World War II), and ended with the Moscow Peace Treaty on 13 March 1940. The League of Nations deemed the attack illegal and expelled the Soviet Union from the League on 14 December 1939.
TEXT.French: La Guerre d'Hiver fut un conflit militaire entre l'Union soviétique et la Finlande en 1939-1940. Elle débuta avec l'invasion soviétique de la Finlande le 30 novembre 1939 (trois mois après le début de la Seconde Guerre mondiale), et s'acheva avec le Traité de paix de Moscou le 13 mars 1940. La Société des Nations déclara l'attaque illégale et expulsé l'Union soviétique le 14 décembre 1939.

TEXT.English: Tarumanagara or Taruma Kingdom or just Taruma is an early Sundanese Indianised kingdom, whose 5th-century ruler, Purnawarman, produced the earliest known inscriptions on Java island. The kingdom was not far from modern Jakarta, and according to Tugu inscription Purnavarman apparently built a canal that changed the course of the Cakung River, and drained a coastal area for agriculture and settlement. In his inscriptions, Purnavarman associated himself with Vishnu, and Brahmins ritually secured the hydraulic project.

Tasius is the name given by Strabo to the king of the Rhoxolani, a Sarmatian tribal group. Around 100 BCE, Tasius led an invasion of Crimea in support of the Scythian warlord Palacus. He was defeated by the Pontian general Diophantus.
TEXT.French: Tasius est le nom donné par Strabon au roi des Rhoxolani, un groupe tribal sarmate. Vers 100 av. J.-C., Tasius mena une invasion de Crimée pour soutenir le chef scythe Palacus. Il fut vaincu par le général pontique Diophantus.
TEXT.Polish: Tasius to wg. Strabona król Roksolanów, grupy plemiennej Sarmatów. Ok. 100 r. p.n.e. poprowadzi³ inwazjê na pó³wysep krymski.

German.Text: Tasmanischer Teufel:Tasmanischen Teufels:Tasmanischen Teufel:Tasmanischen Teufel:Tasmanische Teufel:Tasmanischen Teufel:Tasmanischen Teufeln:Tasmanischen Teufel

TEXT.English: The Tasmanian devil (Sarcophilus harrisii) is a carnivorous marsupial of the family Dasyuridae, now found in the wild only on the Australian island state of Tasmania. The size of a small dog, it became the largest carnivorous marsupial in the world following the extinction of the thylacine in 1936. It is characterised by its stocky and muscular build, black fur, pungent odour, extremely loud and disturbing screech, keen sense of smell, and ferocity when feeding. The Tasmanian devil's large head and neck allow it to generate the strongest bite per unit body mass of any living mammal, and it hunts prey and scavenges carrion as well as eating household products if humans are living nearby. Although it is usually solitary, it sometimes eats with other devils and defecates in a communal location. Unlike most other dasyurids, the devil thermoregulates effectively and is active during the middle of the day without overheating. Despite its rotund appearance, the devil is capable of surprising speed and endurance, and can climb trees and swim across rivers.[PARAGRAPH:2]It is believed that ancient marsupials migrated from what is now South America to Australia tens of millions of years ago during the time of Gondwana, and that they evolved as Australia became more arid. Fossils of species similar to modern devils have been found, but it is not known whether they were ancestors of the contemporary species, or whether the current devils co-existed with these species. The date that the Tasmanian devil disappeared from the Australian mainland is unclear; most evidence suggests they had contracted to three relict populations around 3000 years ago. A tooth found in Augusta, Western Australia has been dated to 430 years ago, but archaeologist Oliver Brown disputes this and considers the devil's mainland extinction to have occurred around 3000 years ago. This disappearance is usually blamed on dingoes, which are absent from Tasmania. Because they were seen as a threat to livestock and animals that humans hunted for fur in Tasmania, devils were hunted and became endangered. In 1941, the devils, which were originally seen as implacably vicious, became officially protected. Since then, scientists have contended that earlier concerns that the devils were the most significant threat to livestock were overestimated and misplaced.[PARAGRAPH:2]Devils are not monogamous, and their reproductive process is very robust and competitive. Males fight one another for the females, and then guard their partners to prevent female infidelity. Females can ovulate three times in as many weeks during the mating season, and 80% of two-year-old females are seen to be pregnant during the annual mating season. Females average four breeding seasons in their life and give birth to 20 - 30 live young after three weeks' gestation. The newborn are pink, lack fur, have indistinct facial features and weigh around 0.20 g (0.0071 oz) at birth. As there are only four nipples in the pouch, competition is fierce and few newborns survive. The young grow rapidly and are ejected from the pouch after around 100 days, weighing roughly 200 g (7.1 oz). The young become independent after around nine months, so the female spends most of her year in activities related to childbirth and rearing.
TEXT.German: Der Tasmanische Teufel bzw. Beutelteufel (Sarcophilus harrisii) ist der größte lebende Vertreter der Raubbeutler, einer Familie von fleischfressenden Beuteltieren. Seinen teuflischen Namen verdankt er hauptsächlich seinem schwarzen Fell und seinen Ohren, die sich bei Aufregung rot färben, aber auch seinem lauten Kreischen, das noch weit entfernt zu hören ist und seinem besonders bei Erregung sehr unangenehmen Körpergeruch, der dem eines Stinktiers in nichts nachsteht. Männliche Beutelteufel haben eine im Durchschnitt eine Kopf-Rumpf-Länge von 65 cm, eine Schwanzlänge von knapp 26 cm und ein Gewicht von etwa 8 kg. Weibchen sind etwas kleiner und leichter. Die Vorderbeine der Beutelteufel sind etwas länger als die Hinterbeine, ihr Kopf ist kurz und breit, die Zähne sehr kräftig und ideal dafür geeignet, Knochen zu zerbrechen. Eine Untersuchung hat ergeben, dass der Beutelteufel die stärkste Bisskraft unter den Säugetieren hat.[NEWLINE]Beutelteufel leben heute nur noch auf Tasmanien, auf dem australischen Festland ist er wahrscheinlich schon im 14. Jahrhundert aufgrund des Konkurrenzdrucks durch Dingos und der intensiven Bejagung durch Aborigines ausgestorben. Zumindest auf Tasmanien können sie aber noch als verhältnismäßig häufig angesehen werden. Sie nutzen nahezu alle Lebensräume der Insel und kommen auch in den Außenbezirken von Städten vor. Ihre bevorzugten Habitate sind trockene Wälder und die Waldgebiete entlang der Küste. Sie sind abgesehen von der Paarungszeit Einzelgänger und jagen bevorzugt während der Nacht und der Dämmerung. Den heißen Tag verbringen sie entweder in dichtem Gebüsch oder einem unterirdischen Bau. Beutelteufel können schwimmen und besonders im jungen Alter auch auf Bäume klettern.[NEWLINE]Beutelteufel greifen Menschen normalerweise nicht an, verteidigen sich aber mit kräftigen Bissen, wenn sie selbst angegriffen oder gefangen werden, und können für kleine Kinder eine Gefahr darstellen. Die europäischen Siedler im 18./19. Jahrhundert waren überzeugt davon, dass Beutelteufel eine Bedrohung für ihren Viehbestand darstellten, deshalb wurde bereits 1830 ein Prämiensystem etabliert, das den Abschuss von Beutelteufeln belohnte. Über die nächsten 100 Jahre wurde die Anzahl der Beutelteufel so stark reduziert, dass sie kurz vor dem Aussterben standen. Seit 1941 stehen sie unter Schutz, und ihr Bestand erholte sich schnell. In jüngster Zeit führt jedoch eine Seuche wieder zu einem drastischen Schwinden der Population. Es handelt sich um eine Krebserkrankung, von der überwiegend Gesichtsteile betroffen werden, genannt DFTD (Devil Facial Tumour Disease).
TEXT.Polish: Diabe³ tasmañski (Sarcophilus harrisii)? gatunek torbacza z rodziny nie³azowatych, jedyny przedstawiciel rodzaju Sarcophilus. Ma cia³o œredniej wielkoœci, jest krêpy, przysadzisty, ma serdelkowaty ogon, w którym magazynuje t³uszcz i z du¿¹ g³owê, co zapewnia najwiêksz¹ si³ê zgryzu w stosunku do masy cia³a wœród ¿yj¹cych ssaków. Wyj¹tkowo jak na torbacza ma przednie nogi d³u¿sze ni¿ tylne. D³ugie w¹sy czuciowe znajduj¹ siê na pysku i w kêpce na czubku g³owy. Ma jeden zestaw zêbów rosn¹cych powoli przez ca³e ¿ycie.[PARAGRAPH:2]Jest najwiêkszym torbaczem drapie¿nym, a tak¿e padlino¿erc¹. Charakterystyczny dla niego jest smród, gdy jest przestraszony, g³oœne wrzaski (st¹d nazwa) i zawziêtoœæ w czasie po¿ywiania siê. Osi¹ga prêdkoœæ 13 km/h. Spotykany we wszystkich œrodowiskach, ale najbardziej lubi lasy. Zanim wytêpiono wilka workowatego, ¿ywi³ siê przede wszystkim resztkami z tego, co upolowa³ wilk. Diabe³ tasmañski w pó³ godziny jest w stanie poch³on¹c po¿ywienie o wadze wynosz¹cej nawet 40% jego cia³a. Zwierzê aktywne g³ównie w nocy? s³uch jest jego dominuj¹cym zmys³em, posiada te¿ bardzo czu³y wêch, ma natomiast trudnoœci w dostrzeganiu obiektów nieruchomych. Na ogó³ samotnik. Œrednia d³ugoœæ ¿ycia szacowana na 6 lat. Samica ma dobrze rozwiniêt¹ torbê, m³ode (w liczbie ok. 4) rodz¹ siê na pocz¹tku australijskiej zimy.[PARAGRAPH:2]Wymar³ w Australii oko³o XIV wieku. Od 1941 pod ochron¹. W 1996 zaobserwowano zakaŸny rak pyska diab³a, na który zmar³o 1/3 - 1/2 populacji. W maju 2008 roku rz¹d Tasmanii umieœci³ diab³a tasmañskiego na liœcie gatunków zagro¿onych wyginiêciem. W 2008 roku australijscy naukowcy zaobserwowali, ¿e zagro¿one œmierci¹ zwierzêta zaczê³y siê rozmna¿aæ w m³odszym wieku, przy czym liczba samic maj¹cych potomstwo ju¿ w pierwszym roku ¿ycia zwiêkszy³a siê 16-krotnie. Jest to pierwszy znany przypadek wœród ssaków, gdy choroba zakaŸna doprowadzi³a do wzmo¿onej reprodukcji w m³odym wieku. Dawniej diabe³ tasmañski ¿y³ oko³o 5-6 lat i rozmna¿a³ siê w wieku dwóch, trzech i czterech lat. Jednak cierpi¹ca na raka samica, która bêdzie mia³a potomstwo w drugim roku ¿ycia, mo¿e nie zd¹¿yæ go odchowaæ.

TEXT.English: With their unique personality, the Tasmanian devil has been the subject of numerous documentaries, fiction and non-fiction children's books. Royalties from Margaret Wild's Ruby Roars, about a Tasmanian devil, are going to research into DFTD. A 2005 Australian documentary on the Tasmanian devil, Terrors of Tasmania, directed and produced by David Parer and Elizabeth Parer-Cook, follows a female devil called Manganinnie through breeding season and the birth and rearing of her young. The documentary also looks at the effect of devil facial tumour disease and the conservation measures being taken to ensure survival of the Tasmanian devil. It has screened on television in Australia and in the United States on the National Geographic Channel.

Tautalus was Lusitanian leader and commander. The Lusitanian War, called in Greek Pyrinos Polemos ("the Fiery War"), was a war of resistance fought by the Lusitanian tribes of Hispania Ulterior against the advancing legions of the Roman Republic from 155 to 139 BC. The Lusitanians revolted on two separate occasions (155 and again 146) and were pacified. In 154 BC, a long war in Hispania Citerior, known as the Numantine War, was begun by the Celtiberians. It lasted until 133 and is an important event in the integration of what would become Portugal into the Roman and Latin-speaking world.

In the future, once genetics and cybernetics have become commonplace and Cyborgs emerge, the sense of being Superhuman can have a tendancy to overwhelm better judgement. Crime is almost a thing of the past until this point, when the human spirit to rebel and resist resurges in this new extra-powerful cyborg form. The greed of the day is 'mods' and 'upgrades'. When the law stands in the way of this quest for personal expansion of power, it is seen as little more than a hindrance to the Technarchist. Technarchists (Technological Anarchist) are master super villains in their own right and will often contract themselves to the interests of the state while it benefits them to do so. Of course, at some point, if left unchecked, they may attempt to take over the state itself. Many Technarchists feel that the greatest threat Humanity has ever faced is the absolute domination of the biological by the technological and see themselves as those who would fight fire with fire. In this regard, they are quite similar, ideologically, to the Scoundrels of old.
TEXT.Russian: В будущем, когда генетика и кибернетика станут обычным явлением и появятся киборги, чувства сверхчеловека могут иметь тенденцию подавлять наилучшие суждения. Преступность в эту эпоху, как таковая, почти ушла в прошлое ровно до того момента, когда возрождается мятежный человеческий дух новой сверхмощной форме киборга. Главной повесткой дня будут чаще всего всевозможные "модификации" и "улучшения" собственного тела. Когда закон стоит на пути этого стремления к расширению личной власти и воли к могуществу, он рассматривается лишь как помеха для технархистов. Технологи (технологический анархист) сами по себе являются главными суперзлодеями и часто подчиняются интересам государства, в то время как это приносит им пользу. Конечно, в какой-то момент, если их не остановить, они могут попытаться захватить само государство. Многие технархисты считают, что величайшая угроза, с которой человечество когда-либо сталкивалось, - это абсолютное господство биологов над технологией, и они считают себя теми, кто борется с огнем с помощью встречного пала. В этом отношении они вполне идеологически сходны со злодеями прошлых эпох.

TEXT.English: Tecn Umn (Tecn Uman, Tecm Umn, Tecm Umam, or Tekun Umam 1500 - February 20, 1524) was the last ruler and king of the K'iche-Maya people, in the highlands of what is now Guatemala. According to the Kaqchikel annals, he was slain by Spanish Conquistador Don Pedro de Alvarado while waging battle against the Spaniards in the grasslands of El Pinal (Valley of Olintepeque) on February 20, 1524. Tecn Umn is considered the most representative of his people for his bravery and dignity because he fought to protect his land and his people. He was declared Guatemala's official national hero on March 22, 1960 and is commemorated on February 20, on the anniversary of his death. Tecn Umn has inspired a wide variety of activities ranging from the production of statues and poetry to the retelling of the legend in the form of folkloric dances to prayers. Despite this, Tecn Umn's existence is not well documented, and it has proven to be difficult to separate the man from the legend. The legends say Tecn Umn entered battle adorned with precious quetzal feathers, and his nahual (animal spirit guide), also a quetzal bird, accompanied him during the battle. In the midst of the fray, both Alvarado and Tecn, warriors from worlds apart, met face to face, each with weapon in hand. Alvarado was clad in armor and mounted on his warhorse. As horses were not native to the Americas and peoples of Mesoamerica had no beasts of burden of their own, Tecn Umn assumed they were one being and killed Alvarado's horse. (While another version says he merely attacked the horse in an attempt to knock Alvarado down, having no prior illusion that both man and animal to be one and the same.) He quickly realized his error and turned for a second attack but Alvarado's spear pierced through his opponent's chest and into his heart. It was then his nagual, filled with grief, landed on the fallen hero's chest, staining its breast feathers red with blood, and thereafter died. From that day on, all male quetzals bear a scarlet breast and their song has not been heard since. Further, if one is to be placed in captivity, it would die, making the quetzal a symbol of liberty.
TEXT.Polish: Tecun Uman (ur. ok. 1500, zm. 20 lutego 1524) ostatni w³adca i król ludu Kiczów (od³am plemienia Majów), zamieszkuj¹cego wy¿yny dzisiejszej Gwatemali. Wed³ug kroniki Kaqchiquel, zosta³ on zabity przez hiszpañskiego konkwistadora, Pedro de Alvarado, podczas bitwy z Hiszpanami na pampach regionu El Pinal 20 lutego 1524 r. Tecun jest uwa¿any za najwybitniejsz¹ postaæ spoœród cz³onków plemienia, ze wzglêdu na odwagê, honorow¹ postawê oraz walkê w obronie ojczyzny i ludu. 22 marca 1960 r. zosta³ og³oszony bohaterem narodowym Gwatemali. Œwiêto na jego czeœæ obchodzone jest 20 lutego, w rocznicê jego œmierci. Postaæ Tecuna Umana zainspirowa³a wielu twórców, pocz¹wszy od rzeŸbiarzy, którzy wznosili mu pomniki poprzez poetów a¿ do artystów ludowych, którzy jego legendê wspominali w tañcach ludowych i modlitwach. Mimo tego, fakt istnienia historycznego Tecuna Umana nie zosta³ dostatecznie udokumentowany. Okaza³o siê, ¿e w jego przypadku ciê¿ko jest oddzieliæ historiê od legendy.

TEXT.English: Tehuelche is a Mapudungun word meaning "Fierce People". They were also called Patagons ("big feet") by Spanish explorers, who found large footprints made by the tribes on the Patagonian beaches. These large footprints were actually made by the guanaco leather boots that the Tehuelche used to cover their feet.

The tercio or tercio español ("Spanish third") was a Spanish military unit of the Spanish Empire during the era of the dominance of Habsburg Spain in Europe and the Renaissance era. The tercio was an infantry formation made up of pikemen, swordsmen and arquebusiers or musketeers in a mutually supportive formation, that in theory was up to 3,000 soldiers, although it was usually less than half this size. It was also sometimes referred to as the Spanish Square in other countries and the formation was also much used by other powers, especially the Imperial Army of the Holy Roman Empire.

Teres I (reigned 460-445 BC) was the first king of the Odrysian state of Thrace. Thrace had nominally been part of the Persian empire since 516 BC during the rule of Darius the Great, and was re-subjugated by Mardonius in 492 BC. The Odrysian state was the first Thracian kingdom that acquired power in the region, by the unification of many Thracian tribes under a single ruler, King Teres probably in the 470's after the Persian defeat in Greece. Teres, who united the 40 or more Thracian tribes under one banner, was well known for his military abilities and spent much of his life on the battlefield. He died during a military campaign in 445 BC. Historians argue it was against the Triballi, a Thracian tribe occupying a large amount of land to the north of Thrace. He was succeeded by his second son, Sitalces, who seemed to have taken on his father's fighting prowess and used all the tribes to wage war with Macedon.

The Arctic Tern (Sterna paradisaea) is a seabird of the tern family Sternidae. This bird has a circumpolar breeding distribution covering the Arctic and sub-Arctic regions of Europe, Asia, and North America (as far south as Brittany and Massachusetts). The species is strongly migratory, seeing two summers each year as it migrates from its northern breeding grounds along a winding route to the oceans around Antarctica and back, a round trip of about 70,900 km (c. 44,300 miles) each year. This is by far the longest regular migration by any known animal. The Arctic Tern flies as well as glides through the air, performing almost all of its tasks in the air. It nests once every one to three years (depending on its mating cycle); once it has finished nesting it takes to the sky for another long southern migration.[PARAGRAPH:2]Arctic Terns are medium-sized birds. They have a length of 33 - 39 cm (13 - 15 in) and a wingspan of 76 - 85 cm (26 - 30 in). They are mainly grey and white plumaged, with a red beak (as long as the head, straight, with pronounced gonys) and feet, white forehead, a black nape and crown (streaked white), and white cheeks. The grey mantle is 305 mm, and the scapulae are fringed brown, some tipped white. The upper wing is grey with a white leading edge, and the collar is completely white, as is the rump. The deeply forked tail is whitish, with grey outer webs. The hindcrown to the ear-coverts is black.[PARAGRAPH:2]Arctic Terns are long-lived birds, with many reaching thirty years of age. They eat mainly fish and small marine invertebrates. The species is abundant, with an estimated one million individuals. While the trend in the number of individuals in the species as a whole is not known, exploitation in the past has reduced this bird's numbers in the southern reaches of its range.
TEXT.German: Die Küstenseeschwalbe (Sterna paradisaea) ist ein Zugvogel. Sie hat die längste Flugstrecke, denn ihr Brutplatz ist in der Nähe des Nordpols und zum Überwintern zieht sie zum Südpol. Die Schwalbe kann maximal 36 cm groß werden und ihre Flügelspannweite beträgt 24-29 cm. Mit ihrem weißen bis hellgrauen Gefieder sieht sie der Flussseeschwalbe ähnlich. Die schwarze Kappe auf dem Kopf ist jedoch kleiner. Im Schlichtkleid ist der ganze Kopf weiß und der Schnabel schwarz.[PARAGRAPH:2]Die Küstenseeschwalbe lebt in Küstenregionen, vorzugsweise in Wattgebieten. Ihr Aufenthaltsort im Sommer sind die nördlichen Regionen von Nordamerika, Europa und Asien. Sie ernährt sich von Insekten, Fischen und Krebstieren. Als Stoßtaucher erspäht sie die Beute im langsamen Suchflug, klappt dann die Flügel halb zusammen und stürzt steil ins Wasser.[PARAGRAPH:2]Zur Brutzeit versammeln sich ganze Kolonien mit bis zu 1000 Vögeln. Als Brutstätte dienen Sanddünen oder Kiesbetten. Das Weibchen legt ein bis drei Eier, aus denen nach drei Wochen die Jungtiere schlüpfen. Nach weiteren drei Wochen werden die Küken flügge. Viele Jungtiere sterben sehr früh beim Erlernen des Sturzflugs. Ansonsten wird eine Küstenseeschwalbe 10-12 Jahre alt.
TEXT.Polish: Rybitwa popielata (Sterna paradisaea)? gatunek œredniego, wêdrownego ptaka wodnego z rodziny mew (Laridae). Zamieszkuje najdalsze pó³nocne krañce Eurazji i Ameryki Pó³nocnej, pas od Islandii przez Wyspy Brytyjskie, wybrze¿a Francji, Niemiec, Polski i Beneluxu, Pó³wysep Skandynawski, przez Syberiê po Cieœninê Beringa i dalej Aleuty, Amerykê Pó³nocn¹ osi¹gaj¹c na po³udniu Kolumbiê Brytyjsk¹ i Nowy Jork, a tak¿e Grenlandiê. W Europie najbardziej wysuniête na po³udnie lêgi znajduj¹ siê w po³udniowo-zachodniej Francji. Zimuje na paku otaczaj¹cym Antarktydê. W Europie Œrodkowej widuje siê j¹ g³ównie nad Morzem Pó³nocnym i Ba³tykiem. Przylatuje w po³owie kwietnia, a odlatuje od lipca do paŸdziernika. W Polsce gnieŸdzi siê sporadycznie i nieregularnie w Zatoce Gdañskiej i na jeziorach przymorskich - najwy¿ej kilkanaœcie par, czêsta na przelotach w ma³ych grupach. Tylko wyj¹tkowo spotykana w g³êbi l¹du.[PARAGRAPH:2]Jest to ptak który odbywa najd³u¿sze wêdrówki, trasa w jedna stronê mo¿e wynosiæ oko³o 30 000 km. Pó³nocne populacje z Europy przelatuj¹c wzd³u¿ zachodnich jej wybrze¿y spotykaj¹ ptaki z po³udniowego wschodu Ameryki Pó³nocnej. Obie grupy lec¹ dalej wzd³u¿ zachodnich wybrze¿y Afryki docieraj¹c do Przyl¹dku Dobrej Nadziei (niektóre populacje do Chile). Nastêpnie zmierzaj¹ na Antarktydê, gdzie w koñcu koñcz¹ sw¹ podró¿. W ten sposób przemierzaj¹ ogromne dystanse, co powiêksza jeszcze okr¹¿enie ca³ej Antarktydy w ci¹gu roku lub dwóch. Dlatego te¿ 25-letnia rybitwa popielata w swoim ¿yciu mo¿e przelecieæ ok. 1 000 000 km trasê.

TEXT.English: Private Teruo Nakamura was a Taiwan-born soldier of the Imperial Japanese Army from the indigenous Amis tribe, who fought for Japan in World War II and did not surrender until 1974. He is the last known Japanese hold-out to surrender after the end of hostilities in 1945. His name in his native Amis language was Attun Palalin. The Taiwanese press referred to him as Lee Guang-Hui, a name of which he learned only after his repatriation in 1975.
TEXT.French: Le soldat Teruo Nakamura, né à Taïwan dans la tribu indigène Amis, combattit pour l'Armée impériale japonaise pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale et ne se rendit qu'en 1974. Il est le dernier soldat japonais connu à s'être rendu après la fin des hostilités en 1945. Son nom dans sa langue amérindienne était Attun Palalin. La presse taïwanaise l'appelait Lee Guang-Hui, nom qu'il apprit seulement après son rapatriement en 1975.

TEXT.English: Teshub was the Hurrian god of sky and storm. Taru is the Hattian form derived from Teshub. His Hittite and Luwian name was Tarhun (with variant stem forms Tarhunt, Tarhuwant, Tarhunta), although this name is from the Hittite root *tarh- "to defeat, conquer".
TEXT.French: Teshub était le dieu hurrian du ciel et de la tempête. Taru est la forme hattienne dérivée de Teshub. Son nom hittite et lydien était Tarhun (avec variantes Tarhunt, Tarhuwant, Tarhunta), bien que ce nom provienne de la racine hittite *tarh- "vaincre, conquérir".

TEXT.English: A particle-beam weapon uses a high-energy beam of atomic or subatomic particles to damage the target by disrupting its atomic and/or molecular structure. A particle-beam weapon is a type of directed-energy weapon, which directs energy in a particular and focused direction using particles with negligible mass. Some particle-beam weapons are real and have potential practical applications, e.g. as an anti-ballistic missile defense system for the United States and its Strategic Defense Initiative. The vast majority, however, are science fiction and are among the most common weapon types of the genre. They have been known by a myriad of names: phasers, particle accelerator guns, ion cannons, proton beams, lightning rays, ray guns etc.
TEXT.Russian: В бластерах используют высокоэнергетический пучок атомных или субатомных частиц, чтобы повредить цель, разрушив ее атомную и / или молекулярную структуру. Оружие с пучком частиц - это тип оружия с направленной энергией, которое направляет энергию в определенном и сфокусированном направлении, используя частицы с незначительной массой. Некоторые виды оружия с пучками частиц реальны и имеют потенциальное практическое применение, например в качестве системы противоракетной обороны США и их Стратегической оборонной инициативы. Однако подавляющее большинство из них - это научная фантастика и один из самых распространенных видов оружия в этом жанре. Они известны под множеством названий: фазовращатели, ускорители частиц, ионные пушки, протонные лучи, лучи молний, лучевые пушки и т. д.

TEXT.English: Teuta was the queen regent of the Ardiaei tribe in Illyria, who reigned approximately from 231 BC to 227 BC. After the death of her husband Agron, (250-230 BC) the former king of the Ardiaei, she inherited the Ardiaean kingdom, which included much of Illyria proper, though its exact extent remains unknown, and she acted as regent for her young stepson Pinnes with the royal seat in Rhizon (in the Gulf of Kotor, modern Montenegro). According to Polybius, she ruled "by women's reasoning". Teuta started to address the neighbouring states malevolently, supporting the piratical raids of her subjects.

A tewhatewha is a long-handled Maori club weapon. It is shaped like an axe and, formerly used in battle, is now used in ceremonies. Like Pouwhenua and Taiaha, this long club was designed for scientific sparring and lightning strokes and thrusts, aided by quick footwork on the part of the wielder. The blows were not struck with the blade as one would with an axe, but rather with the thicker straight front edge. It was common for tewhatewha to be decorated with a bunch of split pigeon or hawk feathers which hang from a drilled hole near the lower edge of the extension. This decoration may have also had the added benefit of distracting or confusing the wielder's opponent.

The Texas Ranger Division, commonly called the Texas Rangers, is a law enforcement agency with statewide jurisdiction in Texas, based in the capital city of Austin. Over the years, the Texas Rangers have investigated crimes ranging from murder to political corruption, acted in riot control and as detectives, protected the Governor of Texas, tracked down fugitives, and functioned as a paramilitary force at the service of both the Republic (1836-45) and the state of Texas.
TEXT.French: La division des Texas Rangers, communément appelés les Texas Rangers, est une agence d'application de la loi ayant juridiction dans tout l'État du Texas, basée dans la capitale Austin. Au fil des années, les Texas Rangers ont enquêté sur des crimes allant du meurtre à la corruption politique, agi dans le contrôle des émeutes et comme détectives, protégé le gouverneur du Texas, traqué des fugitifs et fonctionné comme une force paramilitaire au service de la République (1836-45) puis de l'État du Texas.

TEXT.English: Thayendanegea or Joseph Brant (March 1743 - November 24, 1807) was a Mohawk military and political leader, based in present-day New York, who was closely associated with Great Britain during and after the American Revolution. Perhaps the Native American of his generation best known to the Americans and British, he met many of the most significant Anglo-American people of the age, including both George Washington and King George III.
TEXT.French: Thayendanegea, ou Joseph Brant (mars 1743 - 24 novembre 1807), était un chef militaire et politique mohawk, basé dans l'actuel État de New York, étroitement associé à la Grande-Bretagne pendant et après la Révolution américaine. Peut-être le natif américain de sa génération le plus connu des Américains et des Britanniques, il rencontra plusieurs des personnalités anglo-américaines les plus importantes de l'époque, dont George Washington et le roi George III.

TEXT.English: Themistocles was an Athenian politician and general. He was one of a new breed of non-aristocratic politicians who rose to prominence in the early years of the Athenian democracy. As a politician, Themistocles was a populist, having the support of lower class Athenians, and generally being at odds with the Athenian nobility. Elected archon in 493 BC, he convinced the polis to increase the naval power of Athens, which would be a recurring theme in his political career. During the first Persian invasion of Greece, he fought at the Battle of Marathon, and was possibly one of the 10 Athenian strategoi (generals) in that battle.
TEXT.Polish: Polityk i wódz ateñski, piastuj¹cy oficjalne stanowiska archonta i stratega, przywódca stronnictwa demokratycznego, twórca potêgi morskiej Aten w V wieku p.n.e. Uwa¿any jest za najwybitniejszego, obok Peryklesa, polityka w historii staro¿ytnych Aten.

TEXT.Italian: Carro armato con cannone di Gauss

TEXT.English: A coilgun (or Gauss Cannon) is a type of projectile accelerator consisting of one or more coils used as electromagnets in the configuration of a linear motor that accelerate a ferromagnetic or conducting projectile to high velocity. In almost all coilgun configurations, the coils and the gun barrel are arranged on a common axis.
TEXT.French: Un canon à bobines (ou canon de Gauss) est un type d'accélérateur de projectiles comprenant une ou plusieurs bobines utilisées comme électroaimants dans une configuration de moteur linéaire qui accélère un projectile ferromagnétique ou conducteur à grande vitesse. Dans presque toutes les configurations de canon à bobines, les bobines et le canon sont alignés sur un même axe.
TEXT.Polish: Broñ paliwowo-powietrzna powsta³a po obserwacji przypadkowych eksplozji py³ów i aerozoli, które mia³y miejsce w silosach lub podczas po¿arów zbiorników z paliwem. Podczas wybuchu bomby paliwowo-powietrznej nastêpuje zapalenie wytworzonego aerozolu i powstanie fali uderzeniowej, która rozprzestrzenia siê od centrum ku krawêdziom chmury z bardzo du¿¹ prêdkoœci¹, powoduj¹c na swej drodze znaczne zniszczenia, zw³aszcza na p³askim terenie. G³ówn¹ si³¹ niszcz¹c¹ broni termobarycznej jest ciœnienie. Czas, w którym przechodzi fala uderzeniowa o bardzo du¿ym ciœnieniu, jest na tyle d³ugi, ¿e broñ ta jest bardzo efektywna przeciwko polom minowym, s³abo opancerzonym pojazdom, samolotom na lotniskach, a nawet schronom.
